original: de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs skye pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs skye pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the state of the effect of immediate succession is produced.

original: gang gi tshe snying po mnyam pa nyid med pa de'i tshe de'i bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gang gi tshe snying po mnyam pa nyid med pa de'i tshe de'i bsgom pa don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: When there is no equality of the essence, then the cultivation of it is pointless, this is the idea.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni chos kyi sku brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni chos kyi sku brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Lord of all the Tathagatas is the Dharma Body.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni gsang ba gsum brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni gsang ba gsum brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Vajra Holder is the one who has attained the three secrets.

original: de gsal bar mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar mdzad pa la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he illuminates that.

original: rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying pos mnyam pa nyid de ni ye shes te de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying pos mnyam pa nyid de ni ye shes te de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The equality of one's own body, speech, and mind is the vajra, and that is the wisdom.

original: de'i rgyud ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyud ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The continuum of that is the uninterrupted engagement.

original: de nyid ni brtan par gyur pa thob pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de nyid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni brtan par gyur pa thob pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de nyid la gnas pa'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra because it is attained as the firm state, and that is the abode.

original: rgyud de nyid las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud de nyid las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the meaning of the term is that which arises from that very continuum.

original: dngos grub thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos grub sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos grub sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: All powers are the various powers of Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje'i ye shes ni dkyil 'khor pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i ye shes ni dkyil 'khor pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: Vajra-knowledge is the phenomena of the mandala deities.

original: khams gsum ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //
analyzed: khams gsum ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //
translated: The three realms are the completely pure buddha-field.

original: snying po che ba'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi dbang du mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: snying po che ba'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi dbang du mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Having made the knowledge consecration with the greatness of the essence, it is said, ‚ÄúAll Ones Gone Thus,‚Äù and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: All Ones Gone Thus are the lords of the great commitment mandala.

original: sku la sogs pa dngos grub ni de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i chos rnams thob pa'o //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa dngos grub ni de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i chos rnams thob pa'o //
translated: The powers of body and so forth are the attainment of the phenomena of that very mandala.

original: khams gsum pa thams cad ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa thams cad ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
translated: All three realms are the great commitment mandala.

original: gang na gnas zhes bya ba ni ji de lta nyid kyi padma'am ji zhu ba'i snying po la yin /
analyzed: gang na gnas zhes bya ba ni ji de lta nyid kyi padma'am ji zhu ba'i snying po la yin /
translated: Where does it abide? Is it in the lotus of just that way or in the essence of the question?

original: gal te snying po la ma yin na de'i tshe snying po'i rgyu mthun pa'i snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dngos grub dang / rdo rje ye shes dang khams gsum pa mi gnas pa de bas na /
analyzed: gal te snying po la ma yin na de'i tshe snying po'i rgyu mthun pa'i snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dngos grub dang / rdo rje ye shes dang khams gsum pa mi gnas pa de bas na /
translated: If it is not in the essence, then at that time, the essence is the natural outflow of the essence, and the power is in the gnosis of equality, and the vajra gnosis does not abide in the three realms.

original: dngos grub de gang la 'gyur zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub de gang la 'gyur zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, what is the power?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //üîΩrdo rje ni @73b dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o // rdo rje ni @73b dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: All the Tathagatas are the lords of the mandala.üîΩThe vajra is the mandala deities.

original: ye shes ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: ye shes ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The gnosis is the mandala of the support.

original: de rnams kyi bdag po ni sdud par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag po ni sdud par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The lord of those is the one who gathers them.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who teaches that is called that.

original: nam mkha' ni snying po de nyid de de la gnas pa ni de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni snying po de nyid de de la gnas pa ni de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Space is that essence, and abiding in that is dissolving into that.

original: gang na gnas zhes bya ba ci de yab yum la gnas sam /
analyzed: gang na gnas zhes bya ba ci de yab yum la gnas sam /
translated: Where does it abide? Does it abide in the father and mother?

original: ci de dag nyid la thim par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: ci de dag nyid la thim par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Or does it dissolve into them?

original: phyogs dang po ltar na ni sgrib pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsam pa la'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang po ltar na ni sgrib pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsam pa la'o //
translated: In the first case, it would not be without obscuration.

original: rdo rje ni sngar bsdus pa thams cad de rig pa dang bcas pa'i mchog dang pos sam /
analyzed: rdo rje ni sngar bsdus pa thams cad de rig pa dang bcas pa'i mchog dang pos sam /
translated: The vajra is all that was gathered before, the supreme with awareness, by the first,

original: de rnams bsdus nas 'dzin par mdzad pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams bsdus nas 'dzin par mdzad pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
translated: or having gathered those, it is the holder of the vajra, because it holds them.

original: sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: It is the realm of space, without obscuration and pure.

original: de ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn who teaches that is also called that.

original: gang na yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang na yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag kyang de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not anywhere, because they ask about that very thing.

original: ngo mtshar ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje la'o //
translated: The wonder is in the vajra of equality.

original: rmad du gyur pa ni snying po rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rmad du gyur pa ni snying po rdo rje la'o //
translated: The marvel is in the essence vajra.

original: de nyid kyis ni ae ma'o rdo rje ae ma'o rdo rje zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni ae ma'o rdo rje ae ma'o rdo rje zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: By that very thing, he says, ‚ÄúAmazing vajra! Amazing vajra!‚Äù

original: rdo rje'i zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i'o //
translated: The vajra is of the vajra holder.

original: bstan pa 'di dag gang yin pa de yang ngo mtshar to //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di dag gang yin pa de yang ngo mtshar to //
translated: That which is taught here is also amazing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: Why? He declares, ‚Äúwherever, etc.‚Äù

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni snying po dang rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rdo rje gang la'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni snying po dang rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rdo rje gang la'o //
translated: ‚Äú Wherever‚Äù is in the sameness of the essence and the vajra.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems med ces bya ba ni go rims bzhin du lus la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems med ces bya ba ni go rims bzhin du lus la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Without body, speech, and mind‚Äù is, respectively, because the body, etc. are non-conceptual and the concepts are unobservable.

original: de ru gzugs ni rnam par bsgom pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su snang bar te /
analyzed: de ru gzugs ni rnam par bsgom pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su snang bar te /
translated: ‚Äú There, the form is meditated‚Äù is the appearance as body, speech, and mind.

original: rim bzhin du de kho na nyid ro gcig pa dang lus dang ngag dang sems su snang bas so //
analyzed: rim bzhin du de kho na nyid ro gcig pa dang lus dang ngag dang sems su snang bas so //
translated: In order, it is the sameness of reality and the appearance as body, speech, and mind.

original: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With regard to the meditation of the person of the knowledge,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he declares, ‚Äúthen, etc.‚Äù

original: yi ge gsum brnyes pa'i phyir rdo rje gsum yang de yin la mchog chen po yang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: yi ge gsum brnyes pa'i phyir rdo rje gsum yang de yin la mchog chen po yang yin pas na'o //
translated: It is the three vajras because it is the attainment of the three syllables, and it is the great supreme because it is the supreme of all.

original: dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The best are the bodhisattvas, because they are excellent.

original: shin tu dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog chen ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: shin tu dam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog chen ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
translated: The great best are the buddhas, because they are extremely excellent.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni tshogs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni tshogs so //
translated: The best of those is the assembly.üîΩThe three vajras of those are the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje gsum ni gsang ba gsum mo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje gsum ni gsang ba gsum mo //
translated: The power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog ni 'byin pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog ni 'byin pa'i mchog go //
translated: The supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.

original: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub kyi thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa'i dngos grub ni dngos grub kyi thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.

original: nam mkha' @74a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' @74a * //
translated: The supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.

original: dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: dbyings ni chos 'byung ba'o //
translated: The supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.

original: de la rdo rje ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: de la rdo rje ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.

original: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni dbus ma'i gdan la gnas pa'o //üîΩsangs rgyas ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i mchog dang po'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas pa ni dbus ma'i gdan la gnas pa'o // sangs rgyas ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i mchog dang po'o //
translated: The supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni snying po bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni snying po bsdus pa ste /
translated: The supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.üîΩThe power of the three vajras is the power of the three secrets.üîΩThe supreme lord of those is the supreme emanation.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i cho ga las grub pa'i sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la sogs pa'i cho ga las grub pa'i sgrib pa med cing dag pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings so //
translated: In the realm of space, which is pure and free from obscurations, by the rite of the method of great passion, and so on.

original: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni glu bzhis bskul ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni glu bzhis bskul ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should meditate‚Äù means by the process of the four songs, and so on.

original: rdo rje'i sku ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra body‚Äù is Vairocana.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra‚Äù is Ak·π£obhya.

original: sku gsum las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsum las byung ba zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from the three bodies‚Äù is blessed by the three bodies, such as Vajra Body, and so on.

original: rnam par 'phro ba ni 'od zer lnga spros pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba ni 'od zer lnga spros pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúRadiating‚Äù is emitting the five lights.

original: spyir bor rdo rje dang phyag tu 'khor lo 'dzin par mdzad pas ni rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin to //
analyzed: spyir bor rdo rje dang phyag tu 'khor lo 'dzin par mdzad pas ni rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin to //
translated: ‚ÄúHolding the vajra wheel‚Äù is holding the vajra and the wheel in the hand.

original: thams cad 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mthun par bsgres pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad 'di ni zhes bya ba ni mthun par bsgres pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúAll of this‚Äù is a general summary.

original: bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can la 'dir phyag rgya chen po blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bud med dang skyes pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can la 'dir phyag rgya chen po blta bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the great seal should be seen as having the nature of the form of a woman or a man.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Vajra-secret-person-of-knowledge.

original: rig ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
analyzed: rig ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
translated: The person who is endowed with the knowledge consort is the person of knowledge.

original: de'i rdo rje ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyi bo dang gsang ba ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyi bo dang gsang ba ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gsum mo //
translated: His vajra, the crown and secret of the universal monarch, are the three places just as they are.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he teaches that.

original: dbyings gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi lha mo bzhi las rigs kyi dbye bas gcig go //
analyzed: dbyings gyur pa zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi lha mo bzhi las rigs kyi dbye bas gcig go //
translated: The transformation of the realm is one of the four goddesses of the three realms, divided by type.

original: mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mdun du bskyed nas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bas so //
analyzed: mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mdun du bskyed nas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bas so //
translated: The pleasing is the one generated in front, by the union with her just as the rite prescribes.

original: rdo rje sku ni gsum gyis mtshan //
analyzed: rdo rje sku ni gsum gyis mtshan //
translated: The vajra body is marked by the three.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang sku gsum gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang sku gsum gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan pa'o //
translated: The vajra and the three bodies are marked just as they are in the places.

original: char 'bebs pas na khyu mchog ste /
analyzed: char 'bebs pas na khyu mchog ste /
translated: The bull is the rain-maker,

original: bde ba chen pos bdag dang gzhan la dbang bskur bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen pos bdag dang gzhan la dbang bskur bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he bestows the consecration of great bliss on himself and others.

original: byang chub ni bsnyen pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni bsnyen pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the result of the approach.

original: sems dpa' ni nye bar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni nye bar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: The hero is the result of the near accomplishment.

original: de dag dang ldan pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is a bodhisattva because he is endowed with them.

original: grags chen rnams ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs legs par spyad pas so //
analyzed: grags chen rnams ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs legs par spyad pas so //
translated: The great fame is due to the good practice of the knowledge observance.

original: zhag bdun gyis gzi chen po zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i nus pa shin tu phul du byung bas so //üîΩde bas rgyu'i stobs chung bas zla ba phyed na'o //üîΩde bas kyang chung bas ni zla ba phyed na'o //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyis gzi chen po zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i nus pa shin tu phul du byung bas so // de bas rgyu'i stobs chung bas zla ba phyed na'o // de bas kyang chung bas ni zla ba phyed na'o //
translated: In seven days, the great splendor is due to the extremely excellent power of the cause.üîΩIn a fortnight, it is due to the lesser power of the cause.üîΩIn a fortnight, it is due to the lesser power of the cause.

original: de bas kyang shin tu chung bas ni phyed dang gnyis kyis te /
analyzed: de bas kyang shin tu chung bas ni phyed dang gnyis kyis te /
translated: In a fortnight and a half, it is due to the extremely lesser power of the cause.

original: de bzhin 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin 'grub pa'o //
translated: Thus, there is accomplishment.

original: @74b sku gsum dngos grub ni 'dod pa'i thar pa'o //
analyzed: @74b sku gsum dngos grub ni 'dod pa'i thar pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the three bodies is the liberation of desire.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the vajra body and so forth.

original: rdo rje ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The vajra is the awareness being.

original: de rnams bsdus pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhi char yang bkod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams bsdus pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhi char yang bkod pa'o //
translated: Their gathering is the arrangement of all four in their respective places.

original: gsang ba'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang mtshan ma'o //
translated: The secret heart is the moon and the sign.

original: gsang chen ni mtshan ma'i lte ba'i zla ba la sa bon no //
analyzed: gsang chen ni mtshan ma'i lte ba'i zla ba la sa bon no //
translated: The great secret is the seed in the moon in the center of the sign.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i gzhung la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i gzhung la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The text that elucidates that is called that.

original: sku gsung thugs ni sems dpa' gsum gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni sems dpa' gsum gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are consecrated by the three beings.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni thugs su chud pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni thugs su chud pa ste /
translated: Their commitments are the realizations.

original: 'di rnams kyi so so'i rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon no //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi so so'i rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon no //
translated: These are the individual seed syllables in their hearts.

original: sku gsum ni mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: sku gsum ni mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The three bodies are the great seal because of their indivisibility.

original: ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: It is the wisdom being.

original: de'i don ni rang gi sa bon no //
analyzed: de'i don ni rang gi sa bon no //
translated: Its meaning is the seed syllable.

original: de'i bstan pa ni 'byin pa po ste /
analyzed: de'i bstan pa ni 'byin pa po ste /
translated: Its teaching is the emanator.

original: de nyid kyi ngos gsum du de nyid las dbye ba gsum gyi sngags spros pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ngos gsum du de nyid las dbye ba gsum gyi sngags spros pa'o //
translated: On its three sides, the three divisions of the mantra are emanated from it.

original: thams cad ces pa ni sngags bdun po de dag bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa ni sngags bdun po de dag bsgom pa'o //
translated: All means the meditation on those seven mantras.

original: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni so so'i gdan gyi mtshan ma rnams kyi nang du gnas pa'i gdan rnams la'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes pa ni so so'i gdan gyi mtshan ma rnams kyi nang du gnas pa'i gdan rnams la'o //
translated: According to the rite means on the seats situated in the signs of their individual seats.

original: 'bras bu ni skad cig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni skad cig gis zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: The result is stated in the words ‚Äúin an instant.‚Äù

original: dus kyi skad cig gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus kyi skad cig gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is ‚Äúin a moment of time.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú Buddhahood‚Äù is the state of being a lord of the tenth stage.

original: sgrub pa'i cho ga lhag ma rnams dang brtul zhugs dang dbang bskur ba'i spros pa rnams ni bco lnga pa las gsungs so //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i cho ga lhag ma rnams dang brtul zhugs dang dbang bskur ba'i spros pa rnams ni bco lnga pa las gsungs so //
translated: The remaining rites of practice, the observances, and the elaborations of consecration are taught in the fifteenth chapter.

original: de de ltar na yan lag drug pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa ni bskyed pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang brtul zhugs dang / gsang ba dang gsang chen dang sdom pa zhes bya ba yan lag drug go //
analyzed: de de ltar na yan lag drug pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa ni bskyed pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang brtul zhugs dang / gsang ba dang gsang chen dang sdom pa zhes bya ba yan lag drug go //
translated: Thus, the cultivation of the person of knowledge with six limbs is the six limbs called creation, consecration, consecration, observance, secret, great secret, and vow.

original: de la sdom pa ni khyu mchog gi sgras gsungs so ;
analyzed: de la sdom pa ni khyu mchog gi sgras gsungs so ;
translated: The vow is taught by the word ‚Äúbull.‚Äù

original: / de bas na 'dir rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa ni rnal 'byor gyi lus yin la snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don yin zhing che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes gnyis nis grub pa'i sbyor ba las kyang sgrub
analyzed: / de bas na 'dir rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa ni rnal 'byor gyi lus yin la snying po mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don yin zhing che ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes gnyis nis grub pa'i sbyor ba las kyang sgrub
translated: Therefore, here the cultivation of the person of knowledge is the yoga body, and the wisdom of the equality of the essence is the unmistaken meaning. The two wisdoms of greatness are like the yoga of the great accomplishment, because they are accomplished from the yoga of the establishment of the two.

original: pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang 'dra ba tshogs yongs su rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang 'dra ba tshogs yongs su rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The yoga of the great accomplishment is like the accomplishment of the perfection of the assembly.

original: sgrub pa'i sbyor ba la gdams pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i sbyor ba la gdams pa'o //
translated: The instruction in the yoga of accomplishment.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor la ni phyi rol gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor la ni phyi rol gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If, etc. In the yoga of the Guhyasamaja, one should not bind the external hand mudra, this is the meaning.

original: mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The mudra of the fist that apprehends the sign

original: yid kyi nyid yin pa'i phyir bkag pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi nyid yin pa'i phyir bkag pa med do //
translated: is not prohibited because it is mental.

original: gal te @75a * //
analyzed: gal te @75a * //
translated: If you do not have this,üîΩ

original: rgyud gzhan dag tu lag pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa med par dngos grub yod pa ma yin pa de ltar 'dir yang yin no zhe na sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan dag tu lag pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa med par dngos grub yod pa ma yin pa de ltar 'dir yang yin no zhe na sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: If one were to think that, just as in other tantras, there is no success without the hand gesture, etc., then the verse beginning with ‚Äúmantras‚Äù was taught.

original: rgyud gzhan dag tu ni de rnams bcing ba ni dam tshig yin la 'dir yang ma bcings pa nyid dam tshig chen po yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan dag tu ni de rnams bcing ba ni dam tshig yin la 'dir yang ma bcings pa nyid dam tshig chen po yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In other tantras, binding those is the pledge, and here also, not binding is the great pledge.

original: gsang ba 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i sbyor bas bza' ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba 'di ni zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i sbyor bas bza' ba'o //
translated: This secret, which is the practice of the body vajra, is the food.

original: rdo rje gsum 'byung zhes bya ba ni rigs gsum gyi thun mong ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum 'byung zhes bya ba ni rigs gsum gyi thun mong ngo //
translated: The arising of the three vajras is the common practice of the three families.

original: khams gsum pa ni lha yul dang mi yul dang sa 'og go //
analyzed: khams gsum pa ni lha yul dang mi yul dang sa 'og go //
translated: The three realms are the god realm, the human realm, and the underworld.

original: nyams dga' ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The delightful is the meditation on the attractive form.

original: dran pa rnams zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsam pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa rnams zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsam pa'o //
translated: The mindfulness is the contemplation in the nature of Locana, etc.

original: gsung gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rjes rnam par spros pa'i rang gi lus kyis te /
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rjes rnam par spros pa'i rang gi lus kyis te /
translated: The vajra of speech is the vajra of speech that is emanated by one's body.

original: spyad ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: spyad ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The observance is to be supplied.

original: dam tshig kun zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig kun zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The all commitments are the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas dwelling in the ten directions.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can du bsgom pa'i rang gi lus ni rdo rje gsum sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can du bsgom pa'i rang gi lus ni rdo rje gsum sku'o //
translated: The body of the three vajras is one's body that is meditated upon as having the nature of the three vajras.

original: de la gnas pa ni nang du 'dus pa'o /
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni nang du 'dus pa'o /
translated: The abiding in that is the inner gathering.

original: de tshim pa dag tu bya ba ni mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba thob pa can du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de tshim pa dag tu bya ba ni mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba thob pa can du bya ba'o //
translated: The satisfying of those is the attainment of supreme bliss and mental joy.

original: gang gi she na rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: gang gi she na rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste /
translated: By what? By the commitment of the three vajras.

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ro gcig par gyur pa yis so //
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ro gcig par gyur pa yis so //
translated: By the identity of body, speech, and mind of that.

original: ji lta bus she na thugs kyi rdo rje ste /
analyzed: ji lta bus she na thugs kyi rdo rje ste /
translated: By what kind? By the vajra of mind.

original: rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pas so //
analyzed: rang gi byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pas so //
translated: By the form of one's enlightenment mind.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams la smad pa dang dgag pa dang dman pa'i 'du shes kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba dang chos kyi longs spyod dang bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te /üîΩdam tshig yin no //
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams la smad pa dang dgag pa dang dman pa'i 'du shes kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba dang chos kyi longs spyod dang bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i phyir te / dam tshig yin no //
translated: The pledges of vajra body and so forth are to be understood as pledges of elixir, enjoyment of Dharma, and unsurpassed worship, respectively, in order to remedy contempt, prohibition, and the idea of inferiority.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni sba bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni sba bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The pledge of the vajra of all transcendent lords is the mandala to be concealed.

original: de ltar na 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor yin te /
translated: Thus, this is the yoga of the stage of completion,üîΩarising from the yoga of the means of achievement and the great means of achievement.

original: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor dag las langs nas 'di ltar yang dang yang du mos par byas te 'dir bdag gi pha dang ma ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor dag las langs nas 'di ltar yang dang yang du mos par byas te 'dir bdag gi pha dang ma ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
translated: Having arisen in this way, one should repeatedly imagine that one's father and mother are method and wisdom,

original: de dag sbyor ba las byung ba'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de dag sbyor ba las byung ba'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: that the seed which arises from their union is the spirit of enlightenment,

original: de yongs su gyur pa ni bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa ni bdag nyid do //
translated: and that one's own body is the transformation of that.

original: de bas na bdag gi mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni gang dag yin pa de dag sangs rgyas lngar ni sangs rgyas thams cad @75b mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na bdag gi mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni gang dag yin pa de dag sangs rgyas lngar ni sangs rgyas thams cad @75b mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, in brief, my five aggregates are the five Buddhas, the nature of the summary of all Buddhas.

original: bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid gang yin pa de dag ni rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid gang yin pa de dag ni rdo rje rnams so //
translated: My body, speech, and mind are the three vajras.

original: skye mched nyid dag pa ste mig la sogs pa drug po gang yin pa de dag nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: skye mched nyid dag pa ste mig la sogs pa drug po gang yin pa de dag nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog ste byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The six sense-spheres, which are pure, are the supreme ma·πá·∏çala of the bodhisattvas, the nature of the summary of all bodhisattvas.

original: khams gsum pa nyid ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo yin te /
analyzed: khams gsum pa nyid ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo yin te /
translated: The three realms themselves are the commitment ma·πá·∏çala,

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can rten gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can rten gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: the nature of the ma·πá·∏çala of the support, which is the nature of perfect pristine awareness.

original: phyi rol gyi sa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni spyan la sogs pa yin pa de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum ni bdag gi gzhal yas khang yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi sa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni spyan la sogs pa yin pa de'i phyir de'i rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum ni bdag gi gzhal yas khang yin no //
translated: Whatever is external, such as earth, etc., that is Locana, etc. Therefore, the three realms, which have that nature, are my celestial mansion.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni nam mkha'o //
translated: Space-vajra is space.

original: de nyid ni bzhi po rnams kyi dbyings yin zhing dam tshig ni bsdus pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni bzhi po rnams kyi dbyings yin zhing dam tshig ni bsdus pa yin te /
translated: That itself is the realm of the four, and the commitment is the collection.

original: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the source of phenomena.

original: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bshad pa ste gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bshad pa ste gsungs so //
translated: That itself is explained as the vajra-holder, i.e., is said to be so.

original: rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo gnyi ga yang nga'i yin pa de bas na nga nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug yin zhing phyi rol gyi 'dod pa lnga ni nga nyid kyi mchod pa'i lha mo yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo gnyi ga yang nga'i yin pa de bas na nga nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug yin zhing phyi rol gyi 'dod pa lnga ni nga nyid kyi mchod pa'i lha mo yin no zhes bya ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: Both the supported and supporting wheels are mine. Therefore, I myself am the lord of the mandala, and the five external objects of desire are my own offering goddesses. This is the meaning to be understood.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni brten pa po'i 'khor lo yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni brten pa po'i 'khor lo yin la /
translated: All the Tathagatas are the supported wheel.

original: gnas ni rten gyi 'khor lo yin zhing de rnams kyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas ni rten gyi 'khor lo yin zhing de rnams kyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pa yin no //
translated: The place is the wheel of the support, and the yogin is the lord of those.

original: de nyid ni dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor ba nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: He is the great Vajrasattva because he is the yogin of the great mandala.

original: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he teaches that.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga of non-equipoise.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi tshogs ro gcig gi tshul du mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi tshogs ro gcig gi tshul du mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The state of equality of all the Tathagatas is the experience of supreme bliss and mental bliss in the manner of a single taste of the assembly of the three secrets.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi which has that as its object is so called.

original: de la ci'i phyir snyoms par 'jug ce na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir snyoms par 'jug ce na /
translated: Why does he enter that?

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de ni byang chub rdo rje ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de ni byang chub rdo rje ste /
translated: That unsurpassed thought of enlightenment is the vajra of enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni slob dpon yin zhing de nyid ni dngos grub thams cad kyi snod yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni slob dpon yin zhing de nyid ni dngos grub thams cad kyi snod yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The one who is consecrated by that is the master, and he alone is the vessel of all powers, not the other.

original: ci'i phyir 'khor la gzigs she na /üîΩdbang bskur ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ni sangs @76a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'khor la gzigs she na / dbang bskur ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ni sangs @76a * //
translated: Why does he look at the retinue?

original: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bskul bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bskul bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: The teaching of the greatness of the consecration is for the sake of urging the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de rnams nyid kyi tshig gi go skabs dbye ba'i don to //
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de rnams nyid kyi tshig gi go skabs dbye ba'i don to //
translated: His silence is for the sake of opening the way for their words.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all the Ones-Gone-Thus

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
translated: are the vajra of those, which is of one taste.

original: des gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The consecration in the mandala of the Gathering of Secrets is called that.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The vajra of the spirit of enlightenment is Great Vajradhara.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang slob dpon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang rdo rje 'chang chen pos dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang slob dpon zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang rdo rje 'chang chen pos dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The bodhisattva and the master are the meaning of ‚Äúgreat Vajradhara and Vajradhara bestowing empowerment.‚Äù

original: gnyis pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med de gnyi ga yang byang chub kyi sems chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa de ni gnyis su dbyer med de gnyi ga yang byang chub kyi sems chen po'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The second is indivisible from the first, because both are the nature of great bodhicitta.

original: slob dpon la ni so so'i skye bo'i chos yod la /
analyzed: slob dpon la ni so so'i skye bo'i chos yod la /
translated: The master has the qualities of an ordinary being,üîΩand the great vajra holder has the qualities of a pure buddha.üîΩTo apprehend them as different, as having different characteristics, is to make a distinction.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnga'o zhes tha dad par mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni gnyis su byed pa yin la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni gnyis su byed pa mi mnga' bas na gnyis su dbyer
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnga'o zhes tha dad par mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni gnyis su byed pa yin la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni gnyis su byed pa mi mnga' bas na gnyis su dbyer
translated: Since the buddhas and bodhisattvas do not have such a distinction, they are indivisible.

original: med pa'o // gal te de rnams la de dag gi gnyis su byed pa ci'i phyir spong zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'o // gal te de rnams la de dag gi gnyis su byed pa ci'i phyir spong zhe na /
translated: If you ask why they abandon such a distinction,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la byas pa drin du go ba'i phyir dang slob dpon nyid la gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang / slob ma rnams kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / bla ma la dad pa mnyam par bya ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la byas pa drin du go ba'i phyir dang slob dpon nyid la gdul bya rnams spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang / slob ma rnams kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / bla ma la dad pa mnyam par bya ba'i phyir dang /
translated: In order to repay the kindness of the great vajra holder, in order to inspire disciples themselves to be teachers, and in order to make disciples equal in faith to great vajradhara and the guru,

original: rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal brtan par byed pa'i phyir dang / tshogs chung dus tshogs bsags pas myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi nga rgyal brtan par byed pa'i phyir dang / tshogs chung dus tshogs bsags pas myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: in order to stabilize the pride of vajradhara, and in order to quickly accomplish the accumulation of merit with little difficulty,

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: how?

original: rigs kyi du zhes gsungs te bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi du zhes gsungs te bstan pa'o //
translated: The verse begins in the family and so on, which is the teaching.

original: ci zhe na de la de rnams kyis de bzhin du blta ba'o //
analyzed: ci zhe na de la de rnams kyis de bzhin du blta ba'o //
translated: What? In that way, they should be seen.

original: mdor yin gyi phyogs kyi dbye ba re re nas rgyas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mdor yin gyi phyogs kyi dbye ba re re nas rgyas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: In brief, not in detail, in each direction.

original: nas zhes bya ba ni 'di'i mthar thug pa'o //üîΩde gang yin zhe na //
analyzed: nas zhes bya ba ni 'di'i mthar thug pa'o // de gang yin zhe na //
translated: The word then indicates the conclusion.üîΩWhat is that? In the ten directions and so on.

original: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad nyid do //
translated: All means all of them.

original: ci'i phyir de mchog par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de mchog par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it to be honored?

original: de'i phyir ngag rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngag rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Hence he says, ‚ÄúSpeech-vajra,‚Äù etc.

original: ngag rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: ngag rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ngag go //
translated: Speech-vajra is indivisible speech.

original: de nyid ni don las mi 'gyur bas na yi ge'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni don las mi 'gyur bas na yi ge'o //
translated: It is a syllable because it does not change from its meaning.

original: ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: bdag cag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúwe,‚Äù etc.

original: bdag cag ces bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung gnas yin @76b pa'i bar du gsungs te /
analyzed: bdag cag ces bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung gnas yin @76b pa'i bar du gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúwe,‚Äù etc., up to ‚Äúthe source of the gnosis of omniscience.‚Äù

original: byang chub nyid ster bar byed pas pha dang ma nas ston pa'i bar yin no //
analyzed: byang chub nyid ster bar byed pas pha dang ma nas ston pa'i bar yin no //
translated: It is a father, mother, up to a teacher because it bestows enlightenment itself.

original: de bas na phan 'dogs pa'i zhing nyid yin pa'i phyir mchod par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de bas na phan 'dogs pa'i zhing nyid yin pa'i phyir mchod par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, it is to be honored because it is a field of benefit.

original: yon tan gyi zhing nyid kyang yin pas ni zhes ston par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag par bstan pa'i zhing nyid ji lta bar ro //üîΩyang 'das ma thag par bstan pa'i zhing nyid ji lta bar ro //
analyzed: yon tan gyi zhing nyid kyang yin pas ni zhes ston par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag par bstan pa'i zhing nyid ji lta bar ro // yang 'das ma thag par bstan pa'i zhing nyid ji lta bar ro //
translated: The word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.

original: yang zhes bya ba yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yang de bzhin no zhes bzhin du sbyar te /üîΩslob dpon zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu blta bar bya'o //üîΩji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni re re'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yang de bzhin no zhes bzhin du sbyar te / slob dpon zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu blta bar bya'o // ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni re re'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.

original: khyad par du 'phags so zhes bya ba la snga ma las 'di nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags so zhes bya ba la snga ma las 'di nyid ces bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same way that was just explained.üîΩThe word also is to be supplied in the phrase in the same

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes ni gang de rnams kyi chos thams cad yin la snying por gyur pa ni 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir dang rkang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes ni gang de rnams kyi chos thams cad yin la snying por gyur pa ni 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir dang rkang du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The wisdom of all the buddhas is all their dharmas, and it is the essence because it is their collection and it is their foundation.

original: skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa ni rgyu'i gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa ni rgyu'i gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the source of their birth because it is the principal cause.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog mkhyen pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of omniscience is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba nyid yin par thos nas byams pa skrag par gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba nyid yin par thos nas byams pa skrag par gyur pa'o ;
translated: Having heard that it is to be worshipped by all the tathƒÅgatas, Maitreya was frightened.

original: / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba nyid du yang gsungs pa de'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba nyid du yang gsungs pa de'i skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: In order to open the opportunity for the statement that it is to be worshipped by all the vajra holders, he says then, etc.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig ni thun mong gi rgyu nyid dam de kho na nyid de dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig ni thun mong gi rgyu nyid dam de kho na nyid de dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The pledge of the spiritual power of all the vajra holders is the common cause, or reality, of the first Vajradhara.

original: de la dmigs pa ni slob dpon de dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni slob dpon de dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The object of that is the master who is like that.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi that has that as its object is called that.

original: ci'i phyir snyoms par 'jug par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyoms par 'jug par mdzad ce na /
translated: Why does he enter into meditative concentration?

original: de nyid la snyoms par 'jug nas rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis de la mchod par bya'o zhes bya bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid la snyoms par 'jug nas rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis de la mchod par bya'o zhes bya bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach that, having entered into meditative concentration, the vajra holders should make offerings to him.

original: dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsum ro gcig pa'i ye shes so /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsum ro gcig pa'i ye shes so /
translated: The vajra wisdom of the three times is the wisdom of the single taste of the three secrets of all tathagatas.

original: de las 'byung ba ni rdo rje 'dzin par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las 'byung ba ni rdo rje 'dzin par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Arising from that means he became a vajra holder.

original: ston pa yin zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa'i zhing nyid de /
analyzed: ston pa yin zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa'i zhing nyid de /
translated: The teacher is the field of benefit.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi zhing nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi zhing nyid do //
translated: The lord of the wisdom of the buddhas is the field of qualities.

original: gal te de lta yin na yang mnyam pa nyid @77a * //
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na yang mnyam pa nyid @77a * //
translated: Even if that is so, it is not the case that the buddhas are not the objects of worship because of their equality.

original: yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that equality.

original: de rnams kyis mchod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyis mchod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then it is not the case that they are not objects of worship by those.

original: 'dir de nyid ces gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir de nyid ces gsungs te /
translated: Here, that very one is mentioned.

original: de nyid ni slob dpon no //
analyzed: de nyid ni slob dpon no //
translated: That very one is the master.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni mchog dang po yin zhing gang de dag thams cad skyed pa po dang ston pa yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni mchog dang po yin zhing gang de dag thams cad skyed pa po dang ston pa yin te /
translated: The Blessed One, the Great Vajra Holder, is the first supreme one, and he is the one who generates and teaches all of them.

original: slob dpon dang mnyam pa nyid las bdag nyid bye brag tu brtags nas /
analyzed: slob dpon dang mnyam pa nyid las bdag nyid bye brag tu brtags nas /
translated: Having examined the master himself as being equal to him,

original: de rnams kyis de la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyis de la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: they should make offerings to him. This is the meaning.

original: phan yon gzhan dag gi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phan yon gzhan dag gi skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to open up the section on other benefits, it is said then and so forth.

original: ci la gnas gang du 'byung zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du rgyu'i gnas skabs dang de mthar thug pas so //
analyzed: ci la gnas gang du 'byung zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du rgyu'i gnas skabs dang de mthar thug pas so //
translated: On what basis, where does it arise? refers to the causal stage and its culmination, respectively.

original: gsang ba gsum ni dbang bskur ba'i sgrub pa'i byang chub kyi sems so /
analyzed: gsang ba gsum ni dbang bskur ba'i sgrub pa'i byang chub kyi sems so /
translated: The three secrets are the bodhicitta of the empowerment practice.

original: des dbang bskur ba'i phyir gang la de'i rang bzhin can gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yod pa ste /
analyzed: des dbang bskur ba'i phyir gang la de'i rang bzhin can gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yod pa ste /
translated: Because of being empowered by that, it is that which has a body, speech, and mind having the nature of that.

original: de yang 'di yin la rdo rje slob dpon yang yin pas so //
analyzed: de yang 'di yin la rdo rje slob dpon yang yin pas so //
translated: He is this, and also a vajra master.

original: de'i lus la sogs pa'i rdo rje la rang gi lha'i sku la sogs par snang ba'i rang gi sems la yin gyi dbang ma bskur ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i lus la sogs pa'i rdo rje la rang gi lha'i sku la sogs par snang ba'i rang gi sems la yin gyi dbang ma bskur ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: In his body, etc., vajra, in his mind which appears as the body, etc. of his deity, not in one who has not been initiated.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje rang gi sems de nyid do //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje rang gi sems de nyid do //
translated: The vajra of the secret of body, speech, and mind is just his own mind.

original: de gang la gnas pa ni dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de gang la gnas pa ni dmigs pa ste /
translated: That which is the basis of that is the objective support.

original: lus la sogs pa la'am ji ltar snang ba'i sems la zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa la'am ji ltar snang ba'i sems la zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: It is in the body, etc. or in the mind as it appears, is what is thought.

original: gang la'ang mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la'ang mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not in anything at all, etc.

original: sems dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dang tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: , because it is not different from the mind.

original: ji ltar snang ba'i sems la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba'i sems la yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not even in the mind as it appears,

original: rang gi sems tsam nyid dang ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid du de rnams snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rang gi sems tsam nyid dang ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid du de rnams snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: because those appear as just his own mind only and as not existing as it appears.

original: cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni brjod par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni brjod par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The silence is because the subject matter is complete.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phan yon no //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phan yon no //
translated: The benefits of the consecration.

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum pa ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni gsang ba gsum pa ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The secret vajra is the bodhicitta of the single taste of the three secrets.

original: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i rdo rje yang de yin la /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i rdo rje yang de yin la /
translated: Since it is the very object of that, it is the secret vajra.

original: ting nge 'dzin kyang yin pas na'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin kyang yin pas na'o //
translated: Since it is also meditative stabilization, it is so called.

original: de las bzhengs pa ni so sor slar sad nas so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs pa ni so sor slar sad nas so //
translated: Rising from that is the arousal of the individual.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun 'byung ba'i rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun 'byung ba'i rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs so //
translated: The vajra source of all the tathagatas and all the bodhisattvas is the accumulation of meditative stabilization.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The great mandala that has the nature of meditative stabilization is so called.

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the mandala of buddhas,

original: bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya //
analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya //
translated: meditative stabilization vajra is fully aroused.

original: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi @77b rnal 'byor pa'i slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gang yin pa des bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi @77b rnal 'byor pa'i slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i phyir sangs rgyas gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gang yin pa des bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that for the sake of initiating the disciples of the Buddha-Yoga, one should enter into the contemplation of the mandala of the Buddha, in which the Buddha is the principal deity.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis //
translated: By the contemplation of the vajra mandala,

original: 'khor lo can kun gzhug par bya //üîΩzhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo can kun gzhug par bya // zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
translated: one should cause all those who possess the wheel to enter.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsam gtan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsam gtan te /
translated: This means that for the sake of initiating the disciples of the Bodhisattva-Yoga, one should enter into the contemplation of the mandala of the vajra, in which the Bodhisattva is the principal deity.

original: bsam gtan gyi rim pa gang yin pa des 'khor lo can thams cad dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi rim pa gang yin pa des 'khor lo can thams cad dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By the process of contemplation, one should cause all those who possess the wheel to enter.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni bri ba'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pas so //
translated: By that very means, means by the teaching of the drawn mandala.

original: slob dpon zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' de'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'chang de'o //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' de'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'chang de'o //
translated: The master is Vajradhara, who has the nature of that gnosis being.

original: snying gar zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i snying gar ro //
analyzed: snying gar zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i snying gar ro //
translated: At the heart means at the heart of the disciple.

original: dbang bskur ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i don gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i don gyi tshogs so //
translated: The place of consecration means the assembly for the purpose of consecration.

original: gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rnams kyis so //
analyzed: gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rnams kyis so //
translated: By the three means by the three rites of consecration, the vase consecration, the secret consecration, and the gnosis of the wisdom consort consecration.

original: ci'i phyir gsum por bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gsum por bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why are they to be done?

original: gsum po nyid kyis slob dpon du byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩslob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba yang sngar phreng ba dang chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming zhes bya ba rig pa'i dbang bskur ba drug po rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid bri ba'i dkyil 'khor ram bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor
analyzed: gsum po nyid kyis slob dpon du byed pa'i phyir ro // slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba yang sngar phreng ba dang chu dang cod pan dang rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming zhes bya ba rig pa'i dbang bskur ba drug po rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid bri ba'i dkyil 'khor ram bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor
translated: Because the three make one a master.üîΩThe consecration of the master is also the six consecrations of the garland, the water, the crest jewel, the vajra, the name, and the lord, which are the rite of the consecration of knowledge as taught in other tantras.

original: du sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: du sbyin par bya ste /
translated: It is to be given in the mandala of the drawn image or the mandala of contemplation.

original: khyad par gyi tshig med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi tshig med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no special word.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: All means all the Buddhas.

original: byang chub ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: Enlightenment means the state of Vajradhara.

original: ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun //
analyzed: ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun //
translated: All the great marvels of powers

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub phra mo thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub phra mo thams cad do //
translated: means all the minor powers.

original: sku gsung thugs ni zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do //
translated: Body, speech, and mind means all the qualities of a Buddha.

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs so //
translated: The wheel of commitment is the assembly of samadhis.

original: de nas bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ji lta bus ji lta bu la sbyin par bya ba ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pas brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: de nas bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ji lta bus ji lta bu la sbyin par bya ba ni brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pas brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: Now, in this mandala of meditation, the consecration is given by a certain kind of consecration to a certain kind of person, who has a firm, unchangeable mind.

original: de la slob dpon gyis sems brtan pa nyid ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal bar mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de la slob dpon gyis sems brtan pa nyid ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal bar mthong ba'o //
translated: The firmness of mind of the master is the clear vision of the emanation mandala.

original: sems mi 'gyur ba nyid kyang dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi @78a * //
analyzed: sems mi 'gyur ba nyid kyang dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi @78a * //
translated: The immobility of the mind is the mandala of the mind itself.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang de kho na nyid du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang de kho na nyid du mthong ba'o //
translated: Even though one performs all the activities of the mandala, one sees reality.

original: slob ma'i sems brtan pa nyid ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor las /
analyzed: slob ma'i sems brtan pa nyid ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor las /
translated: The stability of the mind of the disciple is the mandala of the guru's contemplation.

original: bla ma'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor khyad par du 'phags pa'am dman pa ma yin no zhes stobs dang ldan par mos pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor khyad par du 'phags pa'am dman pa ma yin no zhes stobs dang ldan par mos pa'o //
translated: One should imagine that it is not inferior, but rather superior, and that it is powerful.

original: sems mi 'gyur ba nyid ni bdag ni bla ma dam pa 'dis yang dag par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba dang dbang bskur ba dang / dbang bskur bar gyur pa yin no zhes dus gsum char la yang bdag dang gzhan gyis mi bskyod par nges pa'o //
analyzed: sems mi 'gyur ba nyid ni bdag ni bla ma dam pa 'dis yang dag par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba dang dbang bskur ba dang / dbang bskur bar gyur pa yin no zhes dus gsum char la yang bdag dang gzhan gyis mi bskyod par nges pa'o //
translated: The immobility of the mind is the certainty that one's own and others' minds are unshaken in the three times, thinking, I am being consecrated by this excellent guru, I am being consecrated, and I have been consecrated.

original: dam tshig nyams pa las bslang ba la sogs pa'i don du yang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig nyams pa las bslang ba la sogs pa'i don du yang bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
translated: It is the instruction that one should be consecrated in the mandala of contemplation for the sake of being lifted up from the transgression of the vow, and so forth.

original: bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala of meditation.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: The vajra of all the Tathagatas is the body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Their union is sameness.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ba ste /
translated: The vajra is Vajradhara.

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: His body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni snying po'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni snying po'o //
translated: Their secret is the essence.

original: de gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin la 'dir ni sa bon la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro yin la 'dir ni sa bon la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: What is that? The Bhagavat Vajradaka. Here, the seed is called that.

original: sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The mandala of flesh, bones, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham las bsgrub par bya ba'i lus pags pa khong stong rus pa dang sha rnams khrag gcig pur gyur pas yongs su gang ba'i rkyal ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge kham las bsgrub par bya ba'i lus pags pa khong stong rus pa dang sha rnams khrag gcig pur gyur pas yongs su gang ba'i rkyal ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: This is the body to be accomplished from the syllable kham, the skin, the hollow, the bones, and the flesh, filled with blood alone, the form of a bag.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gang yin pa de rnams kyi snying po ni snying po bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gang yin pa de rnams kyi snying po ni snying po bsdus pa ste /
translated: The essence of those, the body, speech, and mind of Vajrasattva, is the collected essence.

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúvajra dakini‚Äù is this.

analyzed: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni cho ga yis zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o // de la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um hr'i: kham zhes bya ba yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa'i rtse mo gsum de'i lte ba'i 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis bskyed pa dang mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba ni
translated: ‚ÄúOne should meditate‚Äù is to be connected with ‚Äúby means of the rite‚Äù below.

original: cho ga yin no //
analyzed: cho ga yin no //
translated: There, the rite is the generation of the three-pointed sun mandala from the three syllables h≈´·πÉ hri·∏• kha·πÉ, and the consecration with the crown of Ak·π£obhya through the process of the emission and re-absorption of light rays from its center.

original: drag po ni gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa'i dgongs pa can rnams nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag po ni gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa'i dgongs pa can rnams nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fierce ones are so called because they have the intention to destroy the wicked.

original: mi sdug pa ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang / ljags bskyod cing zhal 'gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dbu skra khams ser gyen du brdzes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thod pa dang rgyu ma'i phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan ba can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi sdug pa ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang / ljags bskyod cing zhal 'gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dbu skra khams ser gyen du brdzes pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thod pa dang rgyu ma'i phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan ba can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are ugly because they bare their fangs, move their tongues, and contort their faces, because their hair is tawny and stands on end, and because they are adorned with a garland of heads and entrails, and so forth.

original: khros pa ni g-yon brkyang ba dang smin ma @78b bsdus pa dang / spyan dmar ba dang / ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khros pa ni g-yon brkyang ba dang smin ma @78b bsdus pa dang / spyan dmar ba dang / ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The angry one is the one who is wrathful, with a frown, red eyes, and a ha ha laugh.

original: phyag bzhi po ni mtshon cha bsnams pa'i phyag dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa'i phyag dag dang bcas par phyag drug pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyag bzhi po ni mtshon cha bsnams pa'i phyag dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa'i phyag dag dang bcas par phyag drug pa nyid do //
translated: The four-armed one is the one who has the two arms holding weapons and the two arms embracing Vajra·∏çƒÅka.

original: phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom //
analyzed: phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom //
translated: He is meditated on as holding a skull-cup.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum dang rdo rje dam tshig dang phur bu drag po mchog dag gis bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum dang rdo rje dam tshig dang phur bu drag po mchog dag gis bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar te /

translated: The light rays and so forth are the light rays of the syllable HRƒ™·∏§ of the five colors that radiate and shine forth, and that which has that is so-called.

analyzed: bsam gtan rdo rje ni goms pa brtan par byas pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: The vajra of concentration is the concentration that has stabilized the practice.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni phyag na bsnams pa'i mi'i rus pa'i phur bus bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kyi rkyal pa gnas lnga dag la phug nas der zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyi sbu gus de las khrag drangs la des rang gi kha yongs su gang bar bsgom pa 'di
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni phyag na bsnams pa'i mi'i rus pa'i phur bus bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kyi rkyal pa gnas lnga dag la phug nas der zhugs pa'i 'od zer gyi sbu gus de las khrag drangs la des rang gi kha yongs su gang bar bsgom pa 'di
translated: The application of that is the application of the human bone dagger held in the hand, which is the piercing of the five places of the body of the one to be accomplished, the drawn blood from that by the tube of the light rays that enter there, and the meditation on filling one's own mouth with that.

original: ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: ni sbyor ba yin no //

translated: That is the supreme drawing of blood, and it will be accomplished is the remainder.

original: gdab par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gsad par 'os pa sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis khrag gzhibs la rtse gsum gyis phug pas shi bar bsams na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gdab par bya zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gsad par 'os pa sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis khrag gzhibs la rtse gsum gyis phug pas shi bar bsams na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should kill‚Äù means that one should kill the victim who deserves to be killed by this very method, by sucking his blood and piercing him with the trident, thinking that he has died.

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o //
translated: [He is] the Vajra·∏çƒÅka.

original: rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba ni de'i don gyi thabs so //

analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy means of union‚Äù is by means of meditation.

analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni / nam mkhar gnas pa bsam par bya //
