analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga bzhin du'o //
translated: as stated in the rite beginning with ‚ÄúOne should imagine him standing in space.‚Äù

original: yongs su brtag pa ni legs par sbyangs te de nas bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su brtag pa ni legs par sbyangs te de nas bza' bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should imagine‚Äù means one should thoroughly train, and then one should eat.

original: mchod pa'i yo byad lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i yo byad lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //

analyzed: dam tshig ni spyan la sogs pa'i gzugs yin la de 'dzin pa ni de ltar bsam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The pledge is the form of LocanƒÅ, etc., and ‚Äúone should hold that‚Äù means one should imagine it in that way.

original: sems can gyi khams kyi ma ni bud med yin te /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams kyi ma ni bud med yin te /
translated: The mother of the realm of sentient beings is a woman.

original: thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar thams cad bud med las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar thams cad bud med las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because all beings in beginningless cyclic existence are born from women.

original: rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: The three vajras are the vajra-holder.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rang gi lha'i rnam pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rang gi lha'i rnam pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: His pledge is the form of one's deity.

original: sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra of the vow itself means

original: @79a * // sdom pa 'di nyid la sems brtan pa'i'o //
analyzed: @79a * // sdom pa 'di nyid la sems brtan pa'i'o //
translated: that one's mind is firm in this very vow.

original: lus dang ngag sems longs spyod ni //
analyzed: lus dang ngag sems longs spyod ni //
translated: The enjoyment of body, speech, and mind

original: zhes bya ba ni ro gcig par khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ro gcig par khong du chud pa'o //
translated: means that one should understand them as being of one taste.

original: gsang ba gsum gnas ni padma'o //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gnas ni padma'o //

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje nyid do //

original: bzang po ni kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni kun du bzang po'o //

original: 'dir ni bsam pas thams cad du //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsam pas thams cad du //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi phyed pa'i gzi brjid de de'i don gyi sdom pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is indivisible splendor, and his vow is the meaning of that.

original: spyi bor zhes bya ba ni spyi bo'i steng du'o //
analyzed: spyi bor zhes bya ba ni spyi bo'i steng du'o //
translated: On the crown means on the top of the head.

analyzed: dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin stug cing rgya che ba'i zla ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The mandala is the moon, which is thick and extensive, the nature of the five nectars.

original: aom ni dbus su gnas bsams nas //
analyzed: aom ni dbus su gnas bsams nas //
translated: Having contemplated the syllable o·πÉ in the middle,

translated: one should contemplate the subtle syllable o·πÉ in the middle of the moon.

analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya //

translated: One should imagine that the stream of the five nectars, cool and white, falls in the manner of a single stream, and by flowing through the channel of the body, it pervades the entire body. This is the meaning.

analyzed: gzhan dag na re zla ba'i dbus su rang bzhin gyis zhu ba'i bdud rtsi mgo bo'i dbus su bsams pa'o //

analyzed: sngags 'dzin pa ni sngags grub pa'i'o //
translated: The mantra-holder is one who has accomplished the mantra.üîΩBy the stupas, etc.

original: mchod rten dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / chos thams cad bshad pa dang / mchod pa thams cad sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa ston pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan mas sems can rnams shin tu 'dun par bya'o //

On the fourteenth day of the bright half of the month, together with an external knowledge-woman, one should possess the yoga of the red deity. In whatever place has been described, one should perform the anointment with the five ambrosias, etc.,

original: bar yid kyis rang gi dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags la de'i dbus su thod pa gsum kha sbub pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chang gis legs par byugs pa'i thod pa kha sbub tu bzhag la /
analyzed: bar yid kyis rang gi dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags la de'i dbus su thod pa gsum kha sbub pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chang gis legs par byugs pa'i thod pa kha sbub tu bzhag la /
translated: In the middle, having thoroughly imagined one's mandala, in the center of that, one should place an upside-down skull cup, and on top of that, an upside-down skull cup smeared with liquor possessing the five ambrosias.

original: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga cung cad dang ldan pa'i tshil chen po bzhus pas bkang ba'i thod pa bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i aarga'i shing bal dang padma'i skud pas dkris pa'i sdong bu can du mar me sbar la mtshan phyed kyi dus su thod pa gcig
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi lnga cung cad dang ldan pa'i tshil chen po bzhus pas bkang ba'i thod pa bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i aarga'i shing bal dang padma'i skud pas dkris pa'i sdong bu can du mar me sbar la mtshan phyed kyi dus su thod pa gcig
translated: Then, below that, one should place a skull cup filled with melted human fat possessing a little of the five ambrosias, with a wick wrapped in cotton from an argha tree and lotus thread, and light the lamp.

original: gi stan la 'dud cing thod pa gnyis la pus mo gnyis bzhag ste /
analyzed: gi stan la 'dud cing thod pa gnyis la pus mo gnyis bzhag ste /
translated: At midnight, one should sit on the seat of one skull cup, place one's two knees on the two other skull cups,

original: snyoms par 'jug pas gnas shing rang gi sngags zlos pas dud pa dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pas gnas shing rang gi sngags zlos pas dud pa dbab par bya'o //
translated: and, abiding in union, one should cause smoke to descend by reciting one's mantra.

original: de nas @81a * //
analyzed: de nas @81a * //
translated: Then,

original: de dag bsdus la bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i snum chen po dang sprul la ras sam dar bzang po la thum bur gtums la rig ma'i padmar bcug la de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gnas de nyid du dro ba dang du ba dang 'bar ba'i mtshan ma
analyzed: de dag bsdus la bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i snum chen po dang sprul la ras sam dar bzang po la thum bur gtums la rig ma'i padmar bcug la de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gnas de nyid du dro ba dang du ba dang 'bar ba'i mtshan ma
translated: Having collected them, one should wrap them in a fine cloth or silk together with the five elixirs and the great oil, and place them in the lotus of the knowledge consort.

original: shes par bya ste /
analyzed: shes par bya ste /
translated: One should know the signs of heat, smoke, and flame in that very place through the practice of that.

original: rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya zhing dro ba de nyid kyis mig bskus na thams cad du skad cig gis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang sa la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //üîΩdu ba 'thul bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la spyod pa'i sems can dbang du byed do //
analyzed: rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya zhing dro ba de nyid kyis mig bskus na thams cad du skad cig gis 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang sa la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du byed do // du ba 'thul bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la spyod pa'i sems can dbang du byed do //
translated: One should recite one's mantra one hundred and eight times. If one anoints one's eyes with that heat, one will instantly go and come everywhere, and one will enthrall all beings who move on the earth.üîΩBy the smoke, one will fly in the sky and enthrall all beings who move in the sky.

original: 'bar bas ni nam mkha' thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
analyzed: 'bar bas ni nam mkha' thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
translated: By the flame, one will go everywhere in the sky and enthrall all beings.

original: de ltar na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, there are three kinds of powers.

original: rdo rje mig sman no //
analyzed: rdo rje mig sman no //
translated: The eye salve

original: 'di man chad ni sgrub pa chen po'i sbyor ba'i gdams ngag yin la de yang sbyor ba 'di la skal ba dang ldan pa rnyed par dka' ba nyid dang / 'bras bu che ba nyid kyis gus pa bskyed nas brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di man chad ni sgrub pa chen po'i sbyor ba'i gdams ngag yin la de yang sbyor ba 'di la skal ba dang ldan pa rnyed par dka' ba nyid dang / 'bras bu che ba nyid kyis gus pa bskyed nas brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: From here on is the instruction for the application of the great accomplishment. Moreover, it is to be stated with respect, since this application is difficult to obtain, and since it has a great result.

original: de la rnyed par dka' ba'i dbang du mdzad nas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la rnyed par dka' ba'i dbang du mdzad nas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: With regard to that, in terms of difficulty of obtaining, he says, ‚ÄúThen, ‚Äù etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: The lord of all the tathƒÅgatas is the lord of the ma·πá·∏çala together with the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de ston par mdzad pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par mdzad pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He is so called because he teaches that.

original: ldan zhes bya ba ni myur du de thob pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ldan zhes bya ba ni myur du de thob pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed‚Äù means having the good fortune to quickly obtain that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: All the tathƒÅgatas are the lords of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de yang dang po'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de yang dang po'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Moreover, the first is the nature of the preliminary stage.

original: spyod pa ni de nyid kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don nan tan du byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni de nyid kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don nan tan du byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po mchog ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice is the supreme king of mandalas and the supreme king of activities, which are performed by that very [vajra] for the sake of self and other, and which are the practice together with all the tathagatas.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
translated: That very [vajra] is the vajra, the bearer of the vajra.

original: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin gsum po ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gsum yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin gsum po ni go rims bzhin du rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gsum yin no //
translated: Thus, the three samadhis are, in order, the three bodies of Vajradhara, the dharmakaya, the sambhogakaya, and the nirmanakaya.

original: yang na de nyid ni rdo rje yin te mi zad pa'i rin po che nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na de nyid ni rdo rje yin te mi zad pa'i rin po che nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, that very [vajra] is the vajra, because it is the inexhaustible jewel.

original: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'i sku can yin te go rims bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa dang rgyun mi 'jig pas rtag pa dang rgyun gyis rtag pas so //
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'i sku can yin te go rims bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa dang rgyun mi 'jig pas rtag pa dang rgyun gyis rtag pas so //
translated: Thus, the Tathagata has a permanent body, because he is permanent by nature, permanent by the indestructibility of the continuum, and permanent by the continuity.

original: 'dir dad pa dang @81b sgom pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yi ge gsum gyi skal ba dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni dris pa dang po'i lan gyi don yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dad pa dang @81b sgom pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yi ge gsum gyi skal ba dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni dris pa dang po'i lan gyi don yin no //
translated: Here, both faith and meditation are endowed with the fortune of the three syllables. This is the meaning of the first question and answer.

original: zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal ba ni gdams par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal ba ni gdams par gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
translated: The prostration at the feet is the request for instruction.

original: mi gsung bar gyur pa ni gdams pa'i yul ston pa'o //
analyzed: mi gsung bar gyur pa ni gdams pa'i yul ston pa'o //
translated: The silence is the indication of the object of instruction.

original: yi ge gsum po de'i skal ba yod pa 'dis ni skal ba dang ldan pas zhes gsungs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: yi ge gsum po de'i skal ba yod pa 'dis ni skal ba dang ldan pas zhes gsungs pa nyid yin te /
translated: This one who is endowed with the fortune of those three syllables is said to be endowed with fortune.

original: de rnams kyis rnyed par dka' ba nyid kyang bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis rnyed par dka' ba nyid kyang bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate the difficulty of obtaining them, he says, ‚ÄúBlessed One,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi tshe bskal pa 'das she na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bskal pa 'das she na /
translated: When did the eons pass?

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBlessed One,‚Äù and so on.

original: mar me mdzad mya ngan las 'das pa nas 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du ste de gnyi ga'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mar me mdzad mya ngan las 'das pa nas 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du ste de gnyi ga'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: From the nirvana of Dƒ´pa·πÉkara until KƒÅ≈õyapa‚Äôs manifest enlightenment, that is, the time between those two.

original: ma gsungs so zhes bya ba ni ngas de'i tshe zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ma gsungs so zhes bya ba ni ngas de'i tshe zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase did not speak is to be connected with the phrase at that time below.

original: skal ba med pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dus na zhes gong ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: skal ba med pa zhes bya ba ni de'i dus na zhes gong ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase lacking good fortune is to be connected with the phrase at that time above.

original: gsang ba chen po'i gnas ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i gnas so //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po'i gnas ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i gnas so //
translated: The abode of the great secret is the abode of the Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i don ni sgrub pa'i thabs de nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni sgrub pa'i thabs de nyid rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di'o //
translated: The meaning of that is this very method of practice, which is the king of tantras.üîΩIf it is the case that it was not spoken, then how is the meaning of that established? In order to dispel the doubt of someone who thinks this, it is said, The great result itself was not explained, and so forth. The meaning of that is as follows:üîΩThe phrase was not explained is to be connected with the phrase at that time above.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.

translated: The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.

original: yin no // 'on kyang 'di khyad par 'di'i don chen po gzhan las grub pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: yin no // 'on kyang 'di khyad par 'di'i don chen po gzhan las grub pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase did not speak below.üîΩ The phrase the great result itself is to be connected with the phrase

original: skad cig thang cig yud tsam ni dus kyi skad cig ma'o //
analyzed: skad cig thang cig yud tsam ni dus kyi skad cig ma'o //
translated: A moment, a second, and a period are the moments of time.

original: gal te skad cig de nyid dus ji tsam gyis yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te skad cig de nyid dus ji tsam gyis yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúHow much time is there in a moment?‚Äù

original: gangg'a'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gangg'a'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: [The root text] declares, ‚ÄúThe Ganges,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub bo //üîΩ'bad cing ni gang go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub bo // 'bad cing ni gang go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to enlightenment.üîΩ‚Äú Striving‚Äù refers to the armor-like effort.

original: brtsal ba ni sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: brtsal ba ni sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: ‚Äú Seeking‚Äù refers to the effort of application.

original: de zhes bya ba ni byang chub de'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni byang chub de'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù refers to that enlightenment.

original: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In this very life‚Äù refers to this very birth.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs ni bgrang ba ste ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs ni bgrang ba ste ;
translated: ‚Äú The number of buddhas‚Äù refers to the enumeration of buddhas.

original: sgrub pas sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid dang sgrub pa chen pos sa thams cad nyid du'o //
analyzed: sgrub pas sa bcu'i dbang phyug nyid dang sgrub pa chen pos sa thams cad nyid du'o //
translated: Through practice, [one becomes] the lord of the ten stages, and through great practice, [one becomes] all stages.

original: de dag gis zhes bya ba ni gang dag de'i tshe gdul bya rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de dag gis zhes bya ba ni gang dag de'i tshe gdul bya rnams kyis so //
translated: ‚Äú By them‚Äù refers to those who are to be trained at that time.

original: mi 'gyur ba ni thun mong yin no zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba gsum ni thun mong nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba ni thun mong yin no zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba gsum ni thun mong nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú The three invariabilities are common‚Äù means that the three invariabilities are common.

original: thun mong nyid ni rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @82a * //
analyzed: thun mong nyid ni rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @82a * //
translated: The common is stated with son of good family, etc.

original: so ; gsang ba'i mi 'gyur ba gsum rnam par dag pa ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de ltar snang ba mthong cing ma mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: so ; gsang ba'i mi 'gyur ba gsum rnam par dag pa ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de ltar snang ba mthong cing ma mthong ba yin no //
translated: The secret is the purification of the three unchanging realities, because they do not exist as they appear, and so they are seen as they appear and not seen.

original: cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur ba ni mi 'gyur ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur ba ni mi 'gyur ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement remained silent is because the unchanging is not an object of perception.

original: thams cad cang mi smra bar gyur ba ni bshad pa'i skabs dbye ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad cang mi smra bar gyur ba ni bshad pa'i skabs dbye ba'i don to //
translated: The statement all remained silent is for the purpose of opening the occasion for the explanation.

original: ston pa'i dbang du mdzad nas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: ston pa'i dbang du mdzad nas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: With regard to the teacher, it is stated, Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i 'dod chags chen po'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i 'dod chags chen po'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: There, then is immediately after the great passion of the five manifest enlightenments.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phyogs bcu nas byon pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phyogs bcu nas byon pa rnams so //
translated: The tathagatas are those who have come from the ten directions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam pa lnga las byang chub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam pa lnga las byang chub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin chen po'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas is the great Vajra Holder who is enlightened from the five aspects.

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni thabs kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni thabs kyi sku ste /
translated: His body, speech, and mind are the body of means.

original: der de bzhin gshegs pa lngar gyur nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: der de bzhin gshegs pa lngar gyur nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The five Tathagatas abide there, having become that.

original: rdo rje'i btsun mo ni rig ma dgu'i gzugs kyis de rnams spros pa'i'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i btsun mo ni rig ma dgu'i gzugs kyis de rnams spros pa'i'o //
translated: The Vajra Queen is the emanation of those in the form of the nine knowledge goddesses.

original: bha ga ni shes rab kyi sku der de rnams ro gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bha ga ni shes rab kyi sku der de rnams ro gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: The bhaga is the body of wisdom. There, they become of one taste.

original: lha mo bzhi'i glu'i gzhung rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: lha mo bzhi'i glu'i gzhung rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The text of the song of the four goddesses should be applied in order.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de'i rjes thogs la de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun du bzang po kun du bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyurüîΩto zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de'i rjes thogs la de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun du bzang po kun du bzang po zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyurüîΩto zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: After the explanation remained silent, it should be said, Then, beginning with that, all sentient beings became Samantabhadra, Samantabhadra, having been empowered by the body, speech, and mind vajras of all Tathagatas.

original: gzhung 'di las ni 'di nyid du bshad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhung 'di las ni 'di nyid du bshad par bya ba yin te /
translated: This is to be explained in this scripture.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni snying po'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni snying po'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then, immediately after abiding in the essence-vajra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: all tathƒÅgatas are the lords of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de'i bdag po ni rgyu'o ;
analyzed: de'i bdag po ni rgyu'o ;
translated: Their lord is the cause.

original: / rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: Vajra is the secret of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de 'dzin par mdzad cing bdag nyid la bstod par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin par mdzad cing bdag nyid la bstod par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Since he holds that and praises himself, he is Vajradhara.

original: de rnams kyi ro gcig pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i zhu ba gang yin pa de nyid ni rten dang brten pa skyed par byed pa dang skyed par byed pa zhu bas na chen po yin pa de ltar na rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ro gcig pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i zhu ba gang yin pa de nyid ni rten dang brten pa skyed par byed pa dang skyed par byed pa zhu bas na chen po yin pa de ltar na rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste /
translated: That which is the melting of those into one taste, white like the autumn moon, is great because it melts the creation of the support and the supported and the creator. Thus, he is the great Vajradhara,

original: snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning the essence-vajra.

original: de la bstod pa ni stod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de la bstod pa ni stod par byed pa ste /
translated: Praising that is praising.

original: yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod pas mchod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod pas mchod par byed pa'o //
translated: He worships with the praise of true qualities.

original: dga' bas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba dang yid bde ba'i snying po'i rdo rje de la @82b yongs su mgu bas so //
analyzed: dga' bas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba dang yid bde ba'i snying po'i rdo rje de la @82b yongs su mgu bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúWith joy‚Äù means with complete satisfaction in that essence of the bliss, mental bliss, and joy of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: m'a ma k'is zhes bya ba ni rang gi phyogs nas lhags te /
analyzed: m'a ma k'is zhes bya ba ni rang gi phyogs nas lhags te /
translated: ‚ÄúMƒÅmakƒ´‚Äù means having come from her own direction,

original: rang gi stan la bzhugs pa'i zhe sdang dga' ma'o //
analyzed: rang gi stan la bzhugs pa'i zhe sdang dga' ma'o //
translated: the queen of hatred, who sits on her own seat.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa de'i btsun mo ni so sor rtogs pas tshim par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa de'i btsun mo ni so sor rtogs pas tshim par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The queen of that mind of all the TathƒÅgatas is the mind of enlightenment, which is the essence of the three secrets, because it satisfies with discernment.

original: rdo rje'i thugs zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: rdo rje'i thugs zhes bya ba la ;
translated: ‚ÄúVajra mind‚Äù means

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
translated: the vajra is all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de rnams kyi thugs ni gsang ba gsum zhu ba'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs ni gsang ba gsum zhu ba'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Their mind is the mind of enlightenment, which is the essence of the three secrets.

original: gnas kyi dbang phyug ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug tu zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas kyi dbang phyug ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug tu zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúLord of the place‚Äù means requesting to be the lord of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: sems can khams ni rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can khams ni rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the melting of the constituents of sentient beings, which are the wheel of the support and the supported.

original: dga' ma rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba ni dga' bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ma rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba ni dga' bar byed pa ste /
translated: The delightful ones are the delightful ones of the yoginis,

original: de dag kyang zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and they also melt.

original: yul chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir don chen po'o //
analyzed: yul chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir don chen po'o //
translated: It is of great import because of its great object.

original: yul gang gis she na 'dod pas ste /
analyzed: yul gang gis she na 'dod pas ste /
translated: By what object? By the desire of the yoginis,

original: de rnams kyang zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and they also melt.

original: mchog dang po'i rig ma dang bcas pa zhu ba'i phyir sems can yab chen no ;
analyzed: mchog dang po'i rig ma dang bcas pa zhu ba'i phyir sems can yab chen no ;
translated: It is the great father of sentient beings because of the melting of the supreme knowledge together with the consort.

original: / gnyen mchog ni sangs rgyas rnams te /
analyzed: / gnyen mchog ni sangs rgyas rnams te /
translated: The supreme relatives are the Buddhas,

original: de rnams kyang zhu ba'i phyir gnyen mchog go //
analyzed: de rnams kyang zhu ba'i phyir gnyen mchog go //
translated: and they also melt.

original: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni skur gyur nas don mdzad pa'o //üîΩkhyed kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni skur gyur nas don mdzad pa'o // khyed kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
translated: Please be pleased means that having become the body, one should perform the aim.

original: zhes bya ba ni thun mong du bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thun mong du bsrung ba'o //
translated: Please protect me means the common protection.

original: gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ni mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ni mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: In order to make it clear, he says, O Lord, etc.,

original: mchis bzhed na ni lus can du mdzad par dgyes na'o //
analyzed: mchis bzhed na ni lus can du mdzad par dgyes na'o //
translated: If you wish to be present, then you should be pleased to have a body.

original: mgon po gal te de ring gson par zhes bya ba ni gal te gtso bos bdag 'tsho bar bzhed na'o //
analyzed: mgon po gal te de ring gson par zhes bya ba ni gal te gtso bos bdag 'tsho bar bzhed na'o //
translated: O Lord, if you are alive today means if the principal one wishes me to live.

original: rdo rje'i sku la sogs pa'i yang snying po'i rdo rje nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa de ltar na de dag gi rang bzhin gyis kyang de la bstod pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku la sogs pa'i yang snying po'i rdo rje nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa de ltar na de dag gi rang bzhin gyis kyang de la bstod pa ni /
translated: The essence of the vajra body and so forth is the natural outflow of the vajra itself.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni m'a ma k'is bstod pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni m'a ma k'is bstod pa'i de ma thag tu'o //
translated: Then, immediately after Mamaki's praise,

original: sangs rgyas spyan yin gyi nam mkha'i spyan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan yin gyi nam mkha'i spyan ni ma yin no //
translated: it is the eye of the Buddhas, not the eye of space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ste /
translated: It is the body of all the Tathagatas.

original: de'i btsun mo ni 'khyud pas tshim par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i btsun mo ni 'khyud pas tshim par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: His queen is Tara, because she is satisfied by embracing him.

original: ye shes tsam nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes tsam nyid kyi mthar thug pa'i 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa ste /
translated: The desire to reach the ultimate state of mere gnosis is the vajra desire.

original: de rnams kyi dga' ba ni longs spyod cing 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dga' ba ni longs spyod cing 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Their joy is the enjoyment and embrace.

original: de nyid ni mchod pa yin la de'i mchog ni de'i gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mchod pa yin la de'i mchog ni de'i gtso bo'o //
translated: That itself is the worship, and the supreme of that is the chief of that.

original: don las mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na yi ge'o //
analyzed: don las mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable is because it does not change from the meaning.

original: rjod par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshig ste de yis so //üîΩde bzhin @83a * //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshig ste de yis so // de bzhin @83a * //
translated: The word is because it is the very means of expression.üîΩThe wheel is because it is the means of teaching.

original: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'i sku'o //
analyzed: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje'i sku'o //
translated: The vajra body is because it is the very body of all the Tathagatas.

original: bka'i 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: bka'i 'khor lo ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste /
translated: The wheel of speech is the wheel of Dharma.

original: de yang rnam pa mang po yod mod kyi 'dir ni gzugs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir tshim par byed pas na phan pa'i bka'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa mang po yod mod kyi 'dir ni gzugs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir tshim par byed pas na phan pa'i bka'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: And although it has many aspects, here it is the wheel of the beneficial speech because it satisfies by possessing the special form.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo nyid yin pa'i phyir sems can kun no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo nyid yin pa'i phyir sems can kun no //
translated: All sentient beings are the very wheel of the Buddha because they are the basis of the wheel of the Dharma.

original: byang chub pa'i tshul gyi blo 'di la mnga' bas na sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: byang chub pa'i tshul gyi blo 'di la mnga' bas na sangs rgyas so //
translated: The Buddha is the one who has this mind of enlightenment.

original: don rnams ni de las tha mi dad pa'i phyir don to //
analyzed: don rnams ni de las tha mi dad pa'i phyir don to //
translated: The meanings are the meanings that are not different from that.

original: sangs rgyas kyang de yin la don kyang yin pas na sangs rgyas don to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang de yin la don kyang yin pas na sangs rgyas don to //
translated: The Buddha is the Buddha and the meanings are the meanings, thus it is the Buddha-meaning.

original: ye shes dam pa'i thugs su chud pas na byang chub po ;
analyzed: ye shes dam pa'i thugs su chud pas na byang chub po ;
translated: Enlightenment is the realization of the highest wisdom.

original: / ye shes tsam nyid du snang ba'i phyir don gyi mchog 'di la mnga' bas na don dam pas so //
analyzed: / ye shes tsam nyid du snang ba'i phyir don gyi mchog 'di la mnga' bas na don dam pas so //
translated: The ultimate is the supreme object, because it is the domain of this very mere intuition.

original: snying po'i don ni phan pa ste snying po'i rgyu mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su ste /
analyzed: snying po'i don ni phan pa ste snying po'i rgyu mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su ste /
translated: The meaning of the essence is benefit, because it is the natural outcome of the essence.

original: dus phyis mthong ba'i phyir de ltar na rjes su phan pa ston pa'o //
analyzed: dus phyis mthong ba'i phyir de ltar na rjes su phan pa ston pa'o //
translated: The subsequent is the teaching of benefit, because it is seen later.

original: 'dod chags dam tshig ni lhan cig spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dam tshig ni lhan cig spyod pa'o //
translated: The pledge of passion is the practice of union.

original: bdag la zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o //
analyzed: bdag la zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la'o //
translated: The me is oneself.

original: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i sku nyid brnyes nas dgyes par ro //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i sku nyid brnyes nas dgyes par ro //
translated: The please is the request to be pleased by attaining the vajra body.

original: chags pa ni 'khyud pa ste /
analyzed: chags pa ni 'khyud pa ste /
translated: The passion is the embrace.

original: kho mo ni yongs su bcad pa'i ye shes tsam nyid yin la khyod ni yongs su gcod pa rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: kho mo ni yongs su bcad pa'i ye shes tsam nyid yin la khyod ni yongs su gcod pa rtogs pa yin te /
translated: I am the mere intuition of determination, and you are the realization of determination.

original: yongs su gcod pa ni 'khyud pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa ni 'khyud pa yin no //
translated: The determination is the embrace.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtogs pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtogs pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The Lord of the World is the king of discriminations of all Tathagatas.

original: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang mtshon bya la rnam par gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang mtshon bya la rnam par gzigs pa'o //
translated: His body, speech, and mind are the observed object of the view of the basis of characteristics, the characteristic, and the characterized.üîΩThe way of those is the suchness of the basis of characteristics, etc.

original: de rnams kyi tshul te de ni mtshan gzhi la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid de gzigs pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi tshul te de ni mtshan gzhi la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid de gzigs pa'i yul lo //
translated: The object of the view is the basis of characteristics, etc.

original: 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
translated: Desire is the desire for the vajra.

original: de rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni mtshan nyid do //
translated: The enjoyment of those is the characteristic.

original: de'i dam tshig ste ming gis so //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ste ming gis so //
translated: The commitment of that is the name.

original: smra bas shes par byed cing mtshon par byed pas na gsung ste /
analyzed: smra bas shes par byed cing mtshon par byed pas na gsung ste /
translated: Speech is that which causes knowledge and indicates through speech.

original: brjod pa dang shes rab po //
analyzed: brjod pa dang shes rab po //
translated: It is expression and wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsung nyid yin pas na rdo rje gsung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsung nyid yin pas na rdo rje gsung ngo //
translated: Since it is the vajra speech of all the Ones-Gone-Thus, it is vajra speech.

original: kun la zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun la zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: All is various.

original: zhi ba dang bde ba dag sgrub par byed pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du phan pa yang de yin la brtse ba yang yin pas de ltar na phan zhing thugs brtse ba'o //
analyzed: zhi ba dang bde ba dag sgrub par byed pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du phan pa yang de yin la brtse ba yang yin pas de ltar na phan zhing thugs brtse ba'o //
translated: Since it establishes peace and bliss, it is respectively helpful and loving.

original: 'jig rten dag ni dgos pa'i don ni phan pa dang bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag ni dgos pa'i don ni phan pa dang bde ba'o //
translated: The purpose of the world is benefit and happiness.

original: de mdzad pa ni sgrub pa mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de mdzad pa ni sgrub pa mdzad pa'o //
translated: He accomplishes that, he performs it.

original: @83b rtag tu brtson pa yin gyi res 'ga' ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @83b rtag tu brtson pa yin gyi res 'ga' ni ma yin no //
translated: He is always diligent, not just sometimes.

original: rab dga' ni de kho na nyid thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rab dga' ni de kho na nyid thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: He is delighted, he is engaged in all of reality.

original: de nyid kyi spyod pa 'di la mnga' bas na rab dga' spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi spyod pa 'di la mnga' bas na rab dga' spyod pa'o //
translated: He is the one who has mastery over that conduct, he is the one who delights in conduct.

original: kun du ni rnam pa thams cad du'o //
analyzed: kun du ni rnam pa thams cad du'o //
translated: He is everywhere, in all aspects.

original: bzang po ni phan pa dang bde ba ste /
analyzed: bzang po ni phan pa dang bde ba ste /
translated: He is good, he is beneficial and happy.

original: 'di las 'jig rten las 'gyur ba de ltar na kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: 'di las 'jig rten las 'gyur ba de ltar na kun du bzang po'o //
translated: The world is transformed from this, thus he is everywhere good.

original: des ni 'dis sems can thams cad la dus thams cad du dang / de kho na nyid la spyod pa dang phan pa dang bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad mdzad pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du tshig bzhi po 'di dag yin no //
analyzed: des ni 'dis sems can thams cad la dus thams cad du dang / de kho na nyid la spyod pa dang phan pa dang bde ba'i rnam pa thams cad mdzad pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du tshig bzhi po 'di dag yin no //
translated: By this, he is the one who always acts for the benefit and happiness of all sentient beings, in all ways, and he is the one who always engages in reality. Thus, these four phrases are in that order.

original: dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i gsung de nyid thob nas spyod pas dgyes par ro //
analyzed: dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i gsung de nyid thob nas spyod pas dgyes par ro //
translated: He is the one who delights in conduct, having attained that vajra speech which is delighted.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig ni ro gcig pa'i sku la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig ni ro gcig pa'i sku la sogs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The pledge of the body, speech, and mind of all Ones-Gone-Thus is the exalted wisdom of the single taste of the body, and so forth.

original: 'dod pa ni bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
translated: Desire is bliss and mental satisfaction.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje ste yang dag par rig pa'i cha yis so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje ste yang dag par rig pa'i cha yis so //
translated: That itself is the vajra, by way of the aspect of correct knowing.

original: de'i btsun mo ni yang dag par rig par bya ba sku la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de'i btsun mo ni yang dag par rig par bya ba sku la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Its queen is the suchness of the body, and so forth, which is to be correctly known.

original: ji ltar ni btsun mo yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar ni btsun mo yin zhe na /
translated: How is it a queen?

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis tshim par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis tshim par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is a queen because it satisfies by being its nature.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
translated: This, he says, is by way of the verse that will be explained.

original: bde ba dang yid bde ba ni rdo rje 'dod pa de nyid do //
analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba ni rdo rje 'dod pa de nyid do //
translated: The desire of the vajra is just that bliss and mental satisfaction.

original: de la dga' ba ni sdug pa'o //
analyzed: de la dga' ba ni sdug pa'o //
translated: Delight in that is love.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The verse that elucidates that is called that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is the desire of the vajra because it is the desire of all Ones-Gone-Thus.

original: dam tshig ni yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni yang dag par rtogs pa ste /
translated: The pledge is the realization of the ultimate,

original: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod do //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i longs spyod do //
translated: the enjoyment of Mohavajra and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since it is the supreme of those, it is the pledge.

original: mchog tu phan pa'i bde ba nyid yin pa'i phyir phan don che'o //
analyzed: mchog tu phan pa'i bde ba nyid yin pa'i phyir phan don che'o //
translated: It is of great benefit, because it is the supreme bliss.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung ste /
translated: It is the supreme lineage of the perfect Buddha,

original: rigs gang las de rnams 'byung zhing de rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog go //
analyzed: rigs gang las de rnams 'byung zhing de rnams kyi mchog nyid yin pa'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog go //
translated: because it is the lineage from which those arise and it is the supreme of those.

original: mnyan nyid ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan nyid ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the equality of the taste, because it is of one taste.

original: des rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa'i phyir mnyam nyid rjes brtse'o //
analyzed: des rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa'i phyir mnyam nyid rjes brtse'o //
translated: It is the love of equality, because it is the love that follows from that.

original: rin chen mang po ni sku gsum gyi de bzhin nyid bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rin chen mang po ni sku gsum gyi de bzhin nyid bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great jewel, because it is the collection of the suchness of the three bodies.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yon tan gter gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yon tan gter gyur pa ste /
translated: It is the treasure of good qualities,

original: bdag la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because all the good qualities of the Buddha arise in it, taking it as their object.

original: bdag la dgyes zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa de @84a * //
analyzed: bdag la dgyes zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa de @84a * //
translated: The line Delighted in me refers to the equality of the buddhas.üîΩüîΩ

original: nyid kyis yang dag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyid kyis yang dag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase delighting in me means that he is correctly perceived by means of that very equality.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rig pa bcu po gnyis su med par 'gyur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rig pa bcu po gnyis su med par 'gyur ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means immediately after the ten awarenesses become nondual.

original: 'dod chags thams cad ni rig pa de dag nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags thams cad ni rig pa de dag nyid do //
translated: All passions are those very awarenesses.

original: de rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang /'dod chags so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni gti mug dang / zhe sdang dang /'dod chags so //
translated: Their enjoyment is delusion, hatred, and passion.

original: de las byung ba ni rdo rje'i dpal te snying gar zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga rdo rje nor bur zhu zhing ro gcig par gyur ba ni rdo rje yin la /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni rdo rje'i dpal te snying gar zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga rdo rje nor bur zhu zhing ro gcig par gyur ba ni rdo rje yin la /
translated: Arisen from that is the glory of the vajra, which is the vajra that is the single taste of the five buddhas who enter into the heart and melt into the vajra gem.

original: de nyid ni phun sum tshogs pa'am gzi brjid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni phun sum tshogs pa'am gzi brjid do //
translated: That is the perfection or splendor.

original: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The meditative concentration that focuses on that is called by that name.

original: de la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung par gyur te /
analyzed: de la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung par gyur te /
translated: Having entered into union with that, he became silent.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag ces bya ba ni rig ma bcu po de nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag ces bya ba ni rig ma bcu po de nyid do //
translated: Those consorts of all the tathagatas are the ten knowledge goddesses.

original: dam tshig gi 'khor los zhes bya ba ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i bdag pos so //
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor los zhes bya ba ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rten dang bcas pa'i bdag pos so //
translated: The pledge wheel is the lord of the great pledge mandala with its support.

original: 'dod pa spyod cing ni yang dag par shes par byed cing ngo //
analyzed: 'dod pa spyod cing ni yang dag par shes par byed cing ngo //
translated: The enjoyment of desire is the act of knowing.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni rig pa'i padma'o //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni rig pa'i padma'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ste /
translated: The entire realm of space is the lotus of knowledge.

original: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni ro gcig par gyur pa ste /üîΩston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba yin zhing de nyid ni khu ba yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni ro gcig par gyur pa ste / ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba yin zhing de nyid ni khu ba yin te /
translated: The vajra of the body, speech, and mind of all tathagatas is the single taste of those pledges.

original: khu ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde nyid ni rdo rje chu ste /
analyzed: khu ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro // de nyid ni rdo rje chu ste /
translated: It is white like the autumn moon, and that is the semen, because it is similar to semen.

original: des yongs su gang ba'i bum pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des yongs su gang ba'i bum pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is the vajra water, and the vase filled with that is called that.

original: de ltar dbang ni bskur ba dang po'o //
analyzed: de ltar dbang ni bskur ba dang po'o //
translated: Thus, the first empowerment is conferred.

original: bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje yin la /
analyzed: bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje yin la /
translated: It is a vajra because it is condensed.

original: khong nyid yin pa'i phyir nam mkha' yin zhing gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dbyings te de nyid ni padma'o //
analyzed: khong nyid yin pa'i phyir nam mkha' yin zhing gzhir gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dbyings te de nyid ni padma'o //
translated: Since he is himself, he is space, and since he is the basis, he is the realm, and that itself is the lotus.

original: gang sems can zhes bya ba ni bdag po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
analyzed: gang sems can zhes bya ba ni bdag po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: That which is called ‚Äúsentient beings‚Äù is the retinue with a lord.

original: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni zhu ba de nyid do //
analyzed: sku gsum gyi dam tshig ni zhu ba de nyid do //
translated: The commitment of the three bodies is that very melting.

original: 'di rnams la bu ga'i nang na zhugs shing babs nas yang dag par byung ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams la bu ga'i nang na zhugs shing babs nas yang dag par byung ba mnga' bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since they enter into and descend into the cavities of these, and arise again, he is so called.

original: de ltar na gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gnyis pa'o //
translated: Thus, the second.

original: de rnams rdo rje dpal gyis reg nas zhes bya ba la rdo rje dpal ni zhu ba de nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams rdo rje dpal gyis reg nas zhes bya ba la rdo rje dpal ni zhu ba de nyid do //
translated: Having touched them with the vajra glory, the vajra glory is that very melting.

original: des reg pa ni ro gcig par gyur pa ni reg pa ste /
analyzed: des reg pa ni ro gcig par gyur pa ni reg pa ste /
translated: Touching them is becoming of one taste, which is touching.

original: de rnams kyang de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyang de nyid du zhu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And they also melt into that.

original: de nyid der zhu ba rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid der zhu ba rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can mchog tu bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
translated: That very melting there is the supreme bliss and mental bliss of the one with the gnosis of the three vajras.

original: de ltar na gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gsum pa'o //
translated: Thus, the third.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Everything, etc.

original: de ltar rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur pas na thams cad de bzhin gshegs @84b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur pas na thams cad de bzhin gshegs @84b pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, because they have become endowed with the intuition of the three vajras, they become Tathagatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones.

original: shes bya ba thams cad phyin ci ma log par mkhyen pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: shes bya ba thams cad phyin ci ma log par mkhyen pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: They are Perfectly Enlightened Ones because they know all that is to be known without error.

original: dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa yin la de thams cad bag chags dang bcas par bcom pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa yin la de thams cad bag chags dang bcas par bcom pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'o //
translated: They are Arhats because they have destroyed all the afflictions and their residues.

original: chos ji lta ba de bzhin du ston par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: chos ji lta ba de bzhin du ston par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: They are Tathagatas because they teach things as they are.

original: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbang bskur bar gyur te zhes bya ba 'di'i mthar thug pa'i gzhung ni rim pa gzhan du sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas dbang bskur bar gyur te zhes bya ba 'di'i mthar thug pa'i gzhung ni rim pa gzhan du sbyor ba yin te /
translated: The text from ‚ÄúThen, having bowed down to the Blessed One‚Äù up to ‚Äúthey were consecrated‚Äù is to be applied in another order.

original: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bshad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i de ma thag tu blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bshad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i de ma thag tu blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be read immediately after the passage that will be explained: ‚ÄúThey became silent.‚Äù

original: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni thams cad zhu ba de nas brtsams te'o //
analyzed: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni thams cad zhu ba de nas brtsams te'o //
translated: From that time forth means from the time of the request of all.

original: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams so //
translated: All sentient beings means the sentient beings dwelling in the world systems of the ten directions.

original: kun du bzang po kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur ba ni ming de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang po kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur ba ni ming de skad ces bya ste /
translated: Samantabhadra, Samantabhadra means that he became one who has that name.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he was empowered by the name of Vajra by all the Tathagatas.

original: ci glo bur pa nyid du yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci glo bur pa nyid du yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it just a temporary name?

original: ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: No, he says, the Tathagata... and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni zhu ba de nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni zhu ba de nyid do //
translated: The Vajra of Body, Speech, and Mind of all the Tathagatas is just that melting.

original: des dbang bskur ba ni 'od zer spros pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: des dbang bskur ba ni 'od zer spros pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: Empowered by that is the union of the emission of light rays.

original: 'di man chad de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: 'di man chad de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: From here on, then Vajrapani... and so on.

original: chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ni mngon par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ni mngon par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not realize that it is neither Dharma nor non-Dharma.

original: 'o na ci yin zhen pha dang mas bsdus pa'i phung po la sogs pa zhu ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhen pha dang mas bsdus pa'i phung po la sogs pa zhu ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What is it then? It is the realization of the dissolution of the aggregates, etc. that are included in the parents.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni zhu ba ste /
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni zhu ba ste /
translated: Those means the dissolved.

original: yid kyis myong bar mdzad nas dri bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis myong bar mdzad nas dri bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: Having experienced them mentally, he asks.

original: mthong ba ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
translated: Seeing means making manifest.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la chos ni rdo rje'i ye shes te de dang mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la chos ni rdo rje'i ye shes te de dang mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The sameness of the Dharma of all Buddhas is the vajra-wisdom, and that is the sameness.

original: thams cad du ro gcig ba'i ye shes ni rdo rje ye shes so //
analyzed: thams cad du ro gcig ba'i ye shes ni rdo rje ye shes so //
translated: The wisdom of the one taste of all is the vajra-wisdom.

original: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa ni bde ba la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa ni bde ba la gnas pa'o //
translated: The practice of the vajra-wisdom is the abiding in bliss.

original: bha ga las zhes bya ba ni bha ga rnams las so //
analyzed: bha ga las zhes bya ba ni bha ga rnams las so //
translated: From the bhagas means from the bhagas.

original: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo mtshar gang yin pa ston pa yin te gang zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo mtshar gang yin pa ston pa yin te gang zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The what and so on indicates the wonder, and the what is the statement.

original: de ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig @85a * //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig @85a * //
translated: The word of the syllable of passion.

original: gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni ste /
analyzed: gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni ste /
translated: That is, the realization of the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: rig ma'i nye bar longs spyod ni 'dod chags so //
analyzed: rig ma'i nye bar longs spyod ni 'dod chags so //
translated: The enjoyment of the knowledge consort is passion.

original: de las skyes pa'i mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje ye shes ni yi ge'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje ye shes ni yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable is the unchanging vajra intuition born from that.

original: de'i tshig ni gnas te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phung po la sogs pa byang chub tu rjes su rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshig ni gnas te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phung po la sogs pa byang chub tu rjes su rtogs pa'o //
translated: Its word is the abode, the realization of the enlightenment of the aggregates and so on with their objective reference.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni rdo rje ye shes de nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni rdo rje ye shes de nyid do //
translated: The vajra of space is that very vajra intuition.

original: dam tshig ni der zhus pa ro gcig tu gyur pa'i rgyu des mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni der zhus pa ro gcig tu gyur pa'i rgyu des mtshungs pa ste /
translated: The pledge is the equality of the petitioner with it, by the cause of becoming of one taste with it.

original: sngar zhu ba dang lhan cig tu mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar zhu ba dang lhan cig tu mtshungs pa'o //
translated: It is equal to the previous petition.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, it says not the form aggregate and so on.

original: de la phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas lnga'o //
analyzed: de la phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas lnga'o //
translated: The aggregates are the five Buddhas.

original: khams ni dga' ma rnams dang mchog dang po'o //
analyzed: khams ni dga' ma rnams dang mchog dang po'o //
translated: The elements are the heroines and the supreme first one.

original: skye mched ni yul drug go //
analyzed: skye mched ni yul drug go //
translated: The sense-fields are the six objects.

original: 'dod chags ni reg pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni reg pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Desire is the characteristic of contact.

original: zhe sdang ni so sor 'bigs pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang ni so sor 'bigs pa'o //
translated: Hatred is the individual piercing.

original: gti mug ni kun du 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug ni kun du 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Delusion is the complete embrace.

original: chos ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: chos ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'o //
translated: Dharma is the vajra of space.

original: chos ma yin pa ni lhag ma rnams te /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa ni lhag ma rnams te /
translated: Non-Dharma is the rest.

original: de dag kyang gnyis med cing gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang gnyis med cing gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
translated: They are also non-dual and become non-dual.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa so sor rig pa rnams so //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa so sor rig pa rnams so //
translated: Then, all the Tathagatas, who are the individual realizations of the aggregates and so forth,

original: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni snying po rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni snying po rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur pa'o //
translated: remained silent, meaning that the essence vajra became silent.

original: de'i rjes la de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: After that, what begins with then and so forth.

original: de'i 'og tu ni lha mo bzhi'i glu bzhis bskul ba'i gzhung ngo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni lha mo bzhi'i glu bzhis bskul ba'i gzhung ngo //
translated: After that, the text is the four goddesses' songs that exhort.

original: de'i rjes la de bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la de bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di yin te /
translated: After that, this is the one beginning with ‚ÄúThen the BhagavƒÅn. ‚Äù

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni glu bzhis bskul ba'i 'og tu'o /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni glu bzhis bskul ba'i 'og tu'o /
translated: ‚ÄúThen‚Äù is after the four songs of exhortation.

original: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snying po rdo rje bsdus pa las byung ba'i rang gi sa bon las bskyed pa'i rig ma'i skyes bu'i sku ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snying po rdo rje bsdus pa las byung ba'i rang gi sa bon las bskyed pa'i rig ma'i skyes bu'i sku ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúVajrapƒÅ·πái‚Äù is the body of the knowledge being, generated from one‚Äôs seed syllable, arisen from the vajra-realm essence, the vajra-holder.

original: 'di ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin te dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin te dang po'o //
translated: This is the first samƒÅdhi, the first.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang gi rtog pa gdul bya rnams la 'di ltar rnam par phye bas na bcom pa ste dkyil 'khor ba thams cad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang gi rtog pa gdul bya rnams la 'di ltar rnam par phye bas na bcom pa ste dkyil 'khor ba thams cad do //
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn‚Äù is the one who has conquered, all the ma·πá·∏çala deities, by means of the tathƒÅgatas‚Äô own concepts being distinguished in that way for the disciples.

original: de rnams su sprul pa 'di la yod pas ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de rnams su sprul pa 'di la yod pas ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Since this emanation exists in those, he is the bhagavƒÅn.

original: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the samƒÅdhi called ‚Äúthe supreme ma·πá·∏çala king,‚Äù the second.

original: de rnams la zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang 'khor rnams la'o //
analyzed: de rnams la zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams dang 'khor rnams la'o //
translated: To them means to the mandala deities and the retinue.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni bka' bsgo ba'o sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //üîΩbsgo bar gyis @85b shig ces bya ba ni 'dzin du chug shig pa'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni bka' bsgo ba'o sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do // bsgo bar gyis @85b shig ces bya ba ni 'dzin du chug shig pa'o //
translated: The command is the order, and the secret of the vajra body, etc. is reality.

original: chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rab tu dbye ba ste /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni chos kyi rab tu dbye ba ste /
translated: The order is to make them hold, and the Dharma discourse is the classification of the Dharma.

original: skal ba yod pa ni de'i snod du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: skal ba yod pa ni de'i snod du gyur pa ste /
translated: Those with good fortune are the vessels of that.

original: snying po rdo rje 'od spros pas kun du bzang por byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po rdo rje 'od spros pas kun du bzang por byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is made good by the emission of the essence vajra light, it is good all around.

original: de ltar bsgo ba byas pas dkyil 'khor ba ji snyed pa rang rang gi sprul pa rnams kyis 'byin pa po'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du nyams su blang ste /
analyzed: de ltar bsgo ba byas pas dkyil 'khor ba ji snyed pa rang rang gi sprul pa rnams kyis 'byin pa po'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du nyams su blang ste /
translated: Thus, by the performance of the order, the emanations of each of the mandala deities practice according to the order of the emanator,

original: rang rang gi sprul pa rnams bdag nyid la bsdu bar bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi sprul pa rnams bdag nyid la bsdu bar bar gyur pa'o //
translated: and the emanations of each are gathered into themselves.

original: 'di ni las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin te gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin te gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third meditative stabilization, the supreme victor activity.

original: 'khor rnams ni ston pa'i bka' bzung nas cang mi smra bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor rnams ni ston pa'i bka' bzung nas cang mi smra bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The retinue, having received the teacher's command, became silent.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni de'i bstan pa gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni de'i bstan pa gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, etc. The Lord of all Tathagatas is Vajradharma, in order to uphold his teaching.

original: rdo rje chos ni rdo rje theg pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni rdo rje theg pa ste /
translated: Vajradharma is the Vajra Vehicle.

original: de la dbab par gyur pas phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: de la dbab par gyur pas phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje chos so //
translated: Since he descended into that, Vajrapani is Vajradharma.

original: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid ni gsang chen gyi chos so //
analyzed: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid ni gsang chen gyi chos so //
translated: The reality of commitment is the great secret Dharma.

original: chos kyi dbang phyug ni theg pa chen po'o ;
analyzed: chos kyi dbang phyug ni theg pa chen po'o ;
translated: The lord of Dharma is the Great Vehicle.

original: / de bsrung ba la dbang bas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: / de bsrung ba la dbang bas na rgyal po'o //
translated: Since he has power over that, he is the king.

original: rdo rje yang de yin te thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje yang de yin te thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is also a vajra, because he has the power of unobstructed strength.

original: des na chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po rdo rje'o //
analyzed: des na chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po rdo rje'o //
translated: Therefore, he is the vajra king of the lord of Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams so //
translated: All those Tathagatas are the mandala deities.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: Vajrasattva is the lord of the mandala.

original: de'i yi ge ni de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yi ge rnams te /
analyzed: de'i yi ge ni de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yi ge rnams te /
translated: The syllables are the syllables of his body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje gsum po mi 'gyur bas yi ge zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po mi 'gyur bas yi ge zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are called syllables because the three vajras are unchanging.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge yang yin la gsum po yang de yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge yang yin la gsum po yang de yin no //
translated: Vajrasattva is a syllable, and he is also the three.

original: de rnams la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: Their entry into his body, speech, and mind is the gathering of the mandala.

original: de dag thams cad ni sgrub pa chen po'i gdams ngag go //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni sgrub pa chen po'i gdams ngag go //
translated: All of this is the instruction of the great practice.

original: khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje ni 'dus par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'o //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje ni 'dus par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'o //
translated: The body vajra of all the three realms is the body of the assembled buddhas.

original: gnas shing zhes bya ba ni de rnams la yid kyis so //
analyzed: gnas shing zhes bya ba ni de rnams la yid kyis so //
translated: Abiding means in them with the mind.

original: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid dmigs nas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid dmigs nas zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la bzhugs pa ste /
translated: Having observed their sameness means abiding in oneself.

original: de rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du blta ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du blta ba'o //
translated: They are to be seen as the same as space.

original: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid rang gi nang du chud pa'o /
analyzed: cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid rang gi nang du chud pa'o /
translated: He became silent means that they themselves were absorbed into him.

original: de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa la yang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa la yang shes par bya ste /
translated: In the same way, one should understand AmitƒÅbha and Ak·π£obhya.

original: gsung gi rdo rje @86a * //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje @86a * //
translated: VƒÅgvajra

original: ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: is AmitƒÅbha.

original: phyag na rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: VajrapƒÅ·πái is Ak·π£obhya.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa'o //
translated: He said this means that the root tantra was spoken by the Blessed One, Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni sprul pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byin gyis brlab ces bya ba ni sprul pa'o //
translated: The TathƒÅgatas and so forth. Blessing means emanation.

original: rdo rje ni nye bar bsdu ba ste byin rlabs dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rnams nye bar bsdu ba ni rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni nye bar bsdu ba ste byin rlabs dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rnams nye bar bsdu ba ni rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs so //
translated: Vajra means gathering. The blessing of the vajras, along with the blessing, is the blessing of the vajra.

original: rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa'i gsang ba rnams 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa'i gsang ba rnams 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Vajra means the secret of the ma·πá·∏çala is gathered.

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje byin gyi rlabs kyi /
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje byin gyi rlabs kyi /
translated: The blessing of the vajra, along with the commitments and vows, is the blessing of the vajra.

original: rdo rje ni dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje byin gyi rlabs kyi rdo rje ste ;
analyzed: rdo rje ni dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje byin gyi rlabs kyi rdo rje ste ;
translated: Vajra means the vajra of commitments and vows, the vajra of blessings.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i le'u la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: A chapter that illuminates that is called that.

original: de dag ni 'dir gtso bo yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni 'dir gtso bo yin la /
translated: Those are the main topics here.

original: le'u'i don lhag ma rnams ni zhar las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: le'u'i don lhag ma rnams ni zhar las byung ba yin no //
translated: The remaining topics of the chapter are incidental.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog las le'u bcu bdun pa'o /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad sbyar snyim pa'i me tog las le'u bcu bdun pa'o /
translated: This is the seventeenth chapter in the Flower Bouquet Explanation of the Guhyasamaja Tantra.

original: // / de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bdun gyis gsungs pa la /
analyzed: // / de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bdun gyis gsungs pa la /
translated: Thus, the root tantra was taught by the Bhagavan Vajradhara in seventeen chapters.

original: der gnas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rgyud phyi ma le'u bco brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gcig tu bstan par bya ba de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis zhu ba'i sgo nas skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes byaüîΩba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: der gnas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rgyud phyi ma le'u bco brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gcig tu bstan par bya ba de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis zhu ba'i sgo nas skabs dbye ba'i phyir de nas zhes byaüîΩba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
