original: lha'i gnas yin pas na sa bon no //
analyzed: lha'i gnas yin pas na sa bon no //
translated: The seed is the place of the deity.

original: de'i brjod pa ni yi ge ste nges gnas so //
analyzed: de'i brjod pa ni yi ge ste nges gnas so //
translated: The expression of that is the letter, the definite place.

original: ji ltar rjod par byed pas yi ge yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rjod par byed pas yi ge yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that the letter is the expression?

original: gang gi phyir yi ge tsam 'dir yi ge ma yin te ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir yi ge tsam 'dir yi ge ma yin te ;
translated: Because here the mere letter is not the letter.

original: 'o na ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhig ce na /
translated: What then is it?

original: rdo rje gsum po de yi ge mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po de yi ge mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The three vajras are the immutable syllables.

original: sems gang yin pa de nyid brjod pa'i ngag gi rnam pa dang / lus su yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems gang yin pa de nyid brjod pa'i ngag gi rnam pa dang / lus su yang 'gyur te /
translated: That mind itself is the form of the speech that is expressed, and also the body.

original: rdo rje gsum po de las mi 'gyur bas ni rdo rje gsum yi ge'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po de las mi 'gyur bas ni rdo rje gsum yi ge'o //
translated: Since those three vajras are immutable, the three vajras are syllables.

original: de'i phyir rjod par byed pas na yi ge yin gyi yi ge tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjod par byed pas na yi ge yin gyi yi ge tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are syllables because they express, but they are not mere syllables.

original: sad par bya ba ni dam tshig ste ye shes kyi 'khor la'o //
analyzed: sad par bya ba ni dam tshig ste ye shes kyi 'khor la'o //
translated: The one to be awakened is the commitment, that is, the wheel of gnosis.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge yin te /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge yin te /
translated: It is the seed syllable of the equality of body, speech, and mind.

original: des na de nyid brjod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na de nyid brjod pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is the meaning of ‚Äúthat itself is expressed.‚Äù

original: 'od zer 'byed pa ni 'od 'bar zhig spro ba'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'byed pa ni 'od 'bar zhig spro ba'o //
translated: The emission of light rays is the emission of blazing light.

original: rdo rje kun ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kun ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The vajra of all is that of all buddhas.

original: rdo rje can ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can no //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can no //
translated: The vajra possessor is the one who possesses the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams spyan drangs pa ni 'od zer de nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams spyan drangs pa ni 'od zer de nyid kyis dgug pa'o //
translated: The invocation of those is the summoning by that very light ray.

original: de'i gnas ni ye shes kyi sa bon no //
analyzed: de'i gnas ni ye shes kyi sa bon no //
translated: The place of that is the seed of gnosis.

original: dbang bskur ba dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni bcu drug pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa'i lan ni sku zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs pa la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni bcu drug pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa'i lan ni sku zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs pa la /
translated: The reply to the question about them is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúThe body and so forth.‚Äù

original: sku la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs ni rgyas btab ste /
translated: The body and so forth are the body, speech, and mind of the master of the mandala. The body, speech, and mind are sealed by the body, speech, and mind of the master of the mandala.

original: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhing 'byin par bya'o //
analyzed: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhing 'byin par bya'o //
translated: The mandala should be drawn and created.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa las /üîΩdkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa las / dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
translated: In the Compendium of Practice and so forth, it says:üîΩWho can perfectly draw

original: rab tu brtag par su yis nus //
analyzed: rab tu brtag par su yis nus //
translated: the mandala just as it is?

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of your deity,

original: @106b dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @106b dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the mandala will be accomplished.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas cho ga bzhin du bzhugs shing cho ga bzhin du bcug pa'i slob ma la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas cho ga bzhin du bzhugs shing cho ga bzhin du bcug pa'i slob ma la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Having thus drawn the mandala, one should bestow the consecration of the consecration of the disciple who has entered in accordance with the rite, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir 'dir dbang bskur gsum gsungs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dir dbang bskur gsum gsungs she na /
translated: Why are three consecrations taught here?

original: gsum po nyid kyis slob dpon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum po nyid kyis slob dpon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the three make one a master.

original: de ltar bzhi pa de bzhin no //
analyzed: de ltar bzhi pa de bzhin no //
translated: Thus, the fourth is the same.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum po dag las lhag ma nyid kyi phyir bzhi ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum po dag las lhag ma nyid kyi phyir bzhi ste /
translated: Since the fourth is the remainder of the three, it is the fourth.

original: rig pa'i dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang bskur ro //
translated: It is the consecration of knowledge.

original: de yang de bzhin te zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan ji lta ba de bzhin du ste /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin te zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan ji lta ba de bzhin du ste /
translated: And that is the same, as in other tantras, just as it is.

original: de bas na de'i rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de'i rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood by following other tantras.

original: de yang dbang bskur ba drug ste /
analyzed: de yang dbang bskur ba drug ste /
translated: Moreover, there are six consecrations:

original: phreng ba dang / chu dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phreng ba dang / chu dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: the garland, the water, the diadem, the vajra, the master, and the name consecration.

original: de la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni le'u bcu drug pa nyid du yongs su gsal bar mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni le'u bcu drug pa nyid du yongs su gsal bar mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The empowerment of the vase is fully explained in chapter sixteen itself.

original: gnyis pa ni mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni mig yangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
translated: The second is stated in the line beginning with ‚Äúwith wide eyes,‚Äù etc.

original: sngags ni yid ches pa 'di nyid do //
analyzed: sngags ni yid ches pa 'di nyid do //
translated: The mantra is this very one that is trusted.

original: sngags kyi snod du rung ba ni /
analyzed: sngags kyi snod du rung ba ni /
translated: The one who is a suitable vessel for the mantra

original: thos pa dang dad pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pa dang dad pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is endowed with the distinctions of hearing, faith, etc.

original: me tog ni dus su 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: me tog ni dus su 'byung ba'o //
translated: The flower is timely.

original: rdo rje thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad ni sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: All vajras are all buddhas.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni ro gcig par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni ro gcig par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind is of one taste.

original: de'i rnam pa phyung nas so //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa phyung nas so //
translated: Having brought forth that form,

original: gsum pa ni mchog tu dad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsum pa ni mchog tu dad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The third is stated in the line beginning with ‚Äúsupremely faithful,‚Äù etc.

original: sbyor ba gcig ni rgyud gcig la nan tan du byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gcig ni rgyud gcig la nan tan du byed pa'o //
translated: The single application is the single continuum of practice.

original: dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can //
analyzed: dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can //
translated: The one who is bound by the commitments

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol rnal 'byor ba sgrub pa pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol rnal 'byor ba sgrub pa pa'o //
translated: is the practitioner who is outside of that.

original: shes rab ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Wisdom is the yoginƒ´.

original: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The deluded is

original: gti mug gi rigs rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa na'o //
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa na'o //
translated: the one who has become his own special deity, the type of delusion.

original: gti mug bdag nyid rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
analyzed: gti mug bdag nyid rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
translated: The delusion-natured yoga is the performance of the Vairocana yoga.

original: gti mug dga' ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gti mug dga' ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The delusion-natured woman is

original: rig ma de nyid gti mug dga' mar byas pa'o //
analyzed: rig ma de nyid gti mug dga' mar byas pa'o //
translated: the knowledge woman who is made into the delusion-natured one.

original: gti mug rgyun ni bsil zhing dkar ba'o //
analyzed: gti mug rgyun ni bsil zhing dkar ba'o //
translated: The delusion stream is the cool and white one.

original: gti mug rdo rje rang nyid gyur //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje rang nyid gyur //
translated: The delusion-vajra is the one who has become the very nature of delusion.

original: zhes pas de'i rigs las skyes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pas de'i rigs las skyes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos zhes pa'o //
translated: What need is there to speak of the one born from that type?

original: de ltar phyi ma gsum la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyi ma gsum la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the last three [types of women] should be applied.

original: 'on kyang zhe sdang gi rgyun ni dro zhing gnag pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhe sdang gi rgyun ni dro zhing gnag pa'o //
translated: However, the hatred stream is the warm and dark one.

original: 'dod chags kyi rgyun ni padma r'a ga lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rgyun ni padma r'a ga lta bu'o //
translated: The passion stream is the one like a ruby.

original: shes rab ye shes ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The wisdom-knowledge is Amoghasiddhi.

original: rig pa'i brtul zhugs la sgrub pa pos ni rig pa gnyi g-yongs @107a * //
analyzed: rig pa'i brtul zhugs la sgrub pa pos ni rig pa gnyi g-yongs @107a * //
translated: In the knowledge observance, the adept should hold both knowledges

original: su gzung ste gtang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: su gzung ste gtang bar mi bya'o //
translated: and not let them go.

original: slob dpon tsam bzhi ni phyi rol gyi nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon tsam bzhi ni phyi rol gyi nges pa ma yin no //
translated: The four masters are not external certainties.

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga dag bsten pa ni bcu drug pa dang bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa 'di dag gi lan ni tha mal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang dpa' bo lnga dag bsten pa ni bcu drug pa dang bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa las gsungs pa de'i dri ba zhus pa 'di dag gi lan ni tha mal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The reliance on the five nectars and the five heroes is taught in the sixteenth chapter and the twelfth chapter, etc. The reply to the questions about them is stated beginning with ‚Äúordinary.‚Äù

original: 'dir 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'i rang bzhin gyi tha mal pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'i rang bzhin gyi tha mal pa'o //
translated: Here, the ordinary is the natural one well known in the world.

original: ngo bo nyid des dri ma lnga rnams de nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid des dri ma lnga rnams de nyid do //
translated: By that very nature, the five stains are just that.

original: lus kyi chos la zhes bya ba ni lus gnas pa'i phung po la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: lus kyi chos la zhes bya ba ni lus gnas pa'i phung po la sogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe dharmas of the body‚Äù are the aggregates, etc. that abide in the body.

original: snang ba ni yongs su gsal bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba ni yongs su gsal bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúIllumination‚Äù means ‚Äúto be fully illuminated.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, it is thought that very nature should not be relied upon.

original: de bas na ngo bo nyid de nyid bsten par mi bya bar dgongs so 'o na ji ltar na bdud rtsi lnga yin zhe na /üîΩye shes lnga yis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na ngo bo nyid de nyid bsten par mi bya bar dgongs so 'o na ji ltar na bdud rtsi lnga yin zhe na / ye shes lnga yis byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: Well then, how are they the five nectars?üîΩThey are empowered by the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: ye shes lnga ni spar ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ni spar ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five pristine consciousnesses are the blazing, etc.

original: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab pa ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab pa ni lnga pa'o //
translated: The descent of the nectar of intuition is the fifth.

original: des ni bdud rtsi lnga nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des ni bdud rtsi lnga nyid bdud rtsir gyur pa'o //
translated: By that, the five nectars become nectar.

original: de bas na bdud rtsi lnga zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bdud rtsi lnga zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be the five nectars.

original: 'di rnams kyi 'grel pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi 'grel pa ni rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The commentary on these [lines] is the vajra h≈´·πÉ and so forth.

original: rdo rje ni sngon po kha gyen du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni sngon po kha gyen du bltas pa'o //
translated: The vajra is blue and faces upward.

original: padma ni thod pa dmar po kha bkag pa'o //
analyzed: padma ni thod pa dmar po kha bkag pa'o //
translated: The lotus is a red skull-cup with its mouth closed.

original: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni padma'i nang du'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni padma'i nang du'o //
translated: In the middle of that means in the middle of the lotus.

original: spar ba dang gdung bar bya ba ni ye shes gnyis so //
analyzed: spar ba dang gdung bar bya ba ni ye shes gnyis so //
translated: The burning and melting are the two intuitions.

original: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
translated: The yogƒ´ means by the power of yoga.

original: shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing //
analyzed: shel dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing //
translated: Appearing like a crystal

original: zhes bya ba ni shel dang 'dra bar dang bar byas nas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shel dang 'dra bar dang bar byas nas so //
translated: means having become clear like a crystal.

original: de ni ye shes gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ye shes gsum pa'o //
translated: That is the third intuition.

original: ye shes nyi ma bzhi bar gyur //
analyzed: ye shes nyi ma bzhi bar gyur //
translated: The intuition becomes the fourth sun.

original: ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bstan nas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bstan nas so //
translated: This is taught as being like a sun mandala that has the nature of pristine awareness.

original: de ni ye shes bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ye shes bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth pristine awareness.

original: mtshon cha'i tshogs ni 'od zer rnams so /
analyzed: mtshon cha'i tshogs ni 'od zer rnams so /
translated: The host of weapons are the light rays.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud rtsi gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud rtsi gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'o //
translated: The nectar that exists in the world is the nectar of pristine awareness that exists in the hearts of all buddhas.

original: phab nas kyang zhes bya ba ni thugs kar zhugs te /
analyzed: phab nas kyang zhes bya ba ni thugs kar zhugs te /
translated: Having caused it to descend means that it enters the heart.

original: sbubs kyis 'dren pa bzhin du drangs nas so //
analyzed: sbubs kyis 'dren pa bzhin du drangs nas so //
translated: Having been drawn up by the channel, like drawing up water with a pump.

original: de ni ye shes lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ye shes lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth pristine awareness.

original: bza' ba'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi lus dang / rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / rdo rje'i lce dang / ye shes gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas so //
analyzed: bza' ba'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi lus dang / rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / rdo rje'i lce dang / ye shes gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas so //
translated: By the yoga of eating means by the mantra body, the vajra hook, the vajra tongue, and the consecration with the three pristine awarenesses.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i cho ga nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi lnga'i cho ga nyid kyis so //
translated: Just like that means just by the rite of the five nectars.

original: dpa' bo lnga zhes bya ba ni sha lnga'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo lnga zhes bya ba ni sha lnga'o //
translated: The five heroes are the five meats.

original: bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis //
translated: The rite of the accomplishment of the object of attainment
